So taking this in consideration and looking at some other similar styles and recommendations, I went a full two sizes up from the chart and ordered size XL.  It is a little large so I could have worn a size L and still had enough coverage in the breast.  But because of the style, tying the top and the flowy skirt a little large is not a problem.  It's one of my favorite lingerie pieces.  I received my lingerie at no cost in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I wish I had these a few weeks ago when my ice maker decided to quit working.  Living in a large apartment complex it took a week for them to get to me to repair it since it wasn't an emergency, then they ended up having to replace it.  I long ago lost track of my spare ice trays while moving so I was filling up my ice spheres constantly make sure there was enough ice for everyone.  These ice cube trays are larger than traditional cube trays.  Each cube is 2 inches square and there are six cubes to a tray.  You get two trays.  The trays are made of a soft, flexible silicone that has enough stiffness to give it structure without collapsing and that is BPA free.  These ice trays are useful not just for ice but if you make your own soaps or candles these are the perfect mold for them.  Or for kitchen use, you can also use them to freeze broth, herbs, soup, baby food, fruit, to mold candy, chocolate, jello, etc.  When you need to clean them just throw them in the top rack of your dishwasher.  I'm going to try one of the ideas listed for freezing essential oils in water to put in your shower.  I have been putting eucalyptus oil in my shower to open up my sinus and chest to help me breathe and this would make it last for a longer period in the shower.  I purchased my ice cube trays at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I like this passport hold because it is multi-functional.  It not only has a slot to hold your passport but it also has four slots on the opposite side to hold debit / credit cards and your i.d. cards, and a pocket for cash.  If you don't travel internationally and have no use for a passport, you could use it to hold a small notepad in the passport slot instead.  The holder / wallet is made from a high quality cow hide leather that has been dyed with tannins making the color rich and the leather supple.  The passport holder / wallet measures 4 inches wide by 6 inches length and will easily fit in a purse, backpack, luggage, or most jacket pockets.  It came in a cloth bag inside a gift box that makes it a ready-made gift for someone who loves to travel.  I purchased my holder at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This satin lingerie nightgown is so pretty and sexy.  I got the blue and it is such a gorgeous rich royal blue.  The satin is so soft and it has some stretch to it that makes it cling and mold to your body while at the same being kind of slinky.  The lace and ribbon detail and trim is also very soft and stretchy.  I am so glad it is not scratchy lace, I have bought a lot of expensive lingerie in the past that had rough and scratchy material and trim and it ended up in the back of the dresser never being worn because of it.  This little nightie is comfortable while still looking glamorous.  The color I got is very flattering to any skin tone.  Right now I wear size medium or size 8 to 10 in pants and a medium or large in a top depending on the style. Button up tops can be a real problem. I am 34DD sometimes 34DDD and when buying lingerie, it is difficult to find something sexy that fits through the chest and that is not too big everywhere else. So taking this in consideration and looking at some other similar styles and recommendations, I went a full two sizes up from the chart and ordered size XL.  It is a little large so I could have worn a size L and still had enough coverage in the breast.  The top can be fastened a few different ways.  My two favorite ways are either to tie the straps behind my neck like a halter or to crisscross them in the back and tie them to the two little rings at the top of the skirt in the back.  You could just tie them to the two rings without crisscrossing but I think its more flattering and sexy crossed. I plan on purchasing some of the other colors. When I get married this is on my list as an option for bridesmaid gifts. It would also be perfect for a bridal shower gift.  I received my lingerie at no cost in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This leisure men's belt is made from a single piece of genuine cowhide leather and is very nice quality.  The leather has a fine texture to it and smells wonderful. I love the smell of leather, it is a smell of luxury to me. The buckle is an alloy metal that is silver and black with smooth and textured finishes that is quite attractive.  This belt does not have a typical hole and pin buckle, this one has a ratchet design buckle.  You slide the belt through the buckle and when you clamp the buckle down it grips the grooves of a rubber strip that is sewn into the back of the belt.  It has lever on the side of the buckle to release.  This type of belt makes it really easy to adjust to the size you need because you don't have to punch new holes in your belt.  You can still trim this belt if you need to by removing the buckle.  There is a small square clasp at the base of the buckle that has teeth that holds the leather belt in the buckle.  Pry it open and pull out the belt, trim the belt, and reattach the buckle securing the toothed clasp back into the leather by pressing tightly closed.  The belt that I received was 48 inches and came in a nice gift box,  This belt looks great the dress pants or to dress up jeans. It would make a great gift since the sizing is so versatile  I purchased this belt at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

We love infused water in my house.  I drink water all the time but it is hard to get kids and some adults to drink it like they should.  So I started infusing water a while ago and they drink it more often now.  It is so much healthier than soda and store bought flavored water full of sugars, artificial sweeteners, artificial flavors, etc.  This bottle is a nice quality bottle made of BPA plastic and is shatterproof.  It has a 23 ounce capacity and is great for hiking, camping, taking your infused water to work or school, or just drinking around the house  The infuser basket screws into the and the spout has a grid filter to keep fruit from coming through the spout.  The bottle is comfortable in the hand and fits in my cup holders.  I like that the flip top lid snaps into place with a silicone pad that forms a seal over the spout to prevent leaks.  And I really like the handle that fits flush to the lid when not in use.  I purchased my water infuser bottle at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I got this for my boyfriend because he has thick coarse hair and occasionally gets ingrown hairs.  We had some mixed feelings about the oil.  First the bottle had a small amount of leakage in the bag when it arrived but upon close inspection it appeared to be sealed securely.  I had to peel the safety seal off and the bottle looked full so that was a little bit of a mystery.  Second, the oil smells good, it has a manly smell.  I would have thought the lavender essential oil would make it smell too feminine but the black pepper essential oil give it a kick and the lemon essential oil gives it some citrus.  The spearmint gives it a little bit of a cooling scent and feel.  It also has juniper berry all in a carrier oil.  The first he used it, he didn't have his glasses so he didn't read the bottle that tells you to apply a small amount to your face under a coat of shave gel / cream.  Well he put it on his face as if this was all he needed to shave, in other words, he put a lot on his face.  We he came and told me he couldn't get it to rinse off, that it was like a thick film and that he then got it in his eyes trying to scrub it off in the shower, I thought that this must be a terrible product.  But then after questioning him and finding out what he did I had to laugh, especially since he didn't blind himself.  Now he does it properly and is happy with it's performance, and the way his face is moisturized and soft afterwards without being oily or filmy.  He's neutral on the smell.  Also this would be better dispensed with a pump bottle.  It would be more convenient and less messy since your are using both hands.  That will teach him though not to read directions in the future.  I purchased my oil at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This pack of 10 marshmallow roasting forks are perfect for making smores with the family.  I grew up having bonfires and weeny roasts every year for my and my sister's birthday.  These would have come in handy back then.  Anyone else remember improvising with wire hangers?  With ten there is enough for a party.  We still like to do the bonfire weeny roast, fire pit smores, and campfires.  Each roasting fork is lightweight and almost 2 feet long which is long enough to keep little ones from being so close with supervision and to keep yourself from getting burned.  The wood handles protect your hands from getting burned holding a metal rod.  The handles are ridges to make it a little easier and more comfortable to hold onto and come in several attractive rustic stained colors.  Don't forget to take off the protective rubber tips before using unless you want melted plastic in your smores.  The forks come in a handy storage bag.  These are really cute and practical and would be a great gift for others who like to make smores or hot dogs over a fire, perhaps also a scout troop, youth group, youth camp, etc.  I purchased my roasting fork set at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is such an ingenious idea. Making exercise into a dice game makes exercise fun and challenging.  Each workout is different because it all depends on the roll of the dice.  I got the beginner's quick sweat dice set in the velvet drawstring bag. This exercise idea was developed by a military fitness expert for his mother who had cancer and was a fitness lover and wanted to continue to exercise and needed help with ideas of exercises that were portable and required no equipment.  I love the dice because they take up no room, you can them anywhere for a workout at anytime.  There are six color coded dice. The set I have is normal difficulty.  The white dice is the repetition, the red is for core exercises, the green is for chest exercises, the orange is for arm exercises, the yellow is for leg exercises, and the blue is for cardio.  You can play by yourself or challenge someone.  It's really a lot of fun and challenging yourself or someone else makes it into game so you don't think about it being work especially since no two workouts are alike.  None of the exercises require any equipment and you get instructions how to find the website for video demonstrations of all the exercises.  I look forward to expanded my collection of difficulty dice and some of the other games like the card games.  I purchased my fitness dice at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I am a lifetime chronic insomniac and a lot times I need something to help me sleep.  This natural sleep aid consists of 3 mg melatonin, 250 mg valerian root, and 250 mg gaba.  The capsule are vegan and importantly for me contain no shellfish or other allergens like nuts, tree nuts, eggs, wheat, soy, gluten, sugar, salt, or yeast.  It says you can take 1 or 2 pills but I find that 1 pill is usally enough unless I can sleep for at least 8 hours. If I can't sleep for a full 8 hours 2 pills make me too groggy the next morning.  If I take it early enough and can sleep for 8 hours or more than 2 pills helps me sleep the deepest and feel fully rested.  The pills are easy to swallow and have no aftertaste. I purchased my sleeping pills at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

How convenient is this applicator?  This lavender balm comes in an applicator like a stick of deodorant for easy application with no mess.  Instead of oils or liquid or creams and lotions it's a solid stick that you just swipe across your skin then rub in and it absorbs quickly.  The balm itself consist of 100% organic beeswax and three different types of lavender essential oils.  The three different types of lavender essential oils are Lavendula L (Spanish), English lavender, and French lavender. The combination of the different varieties of lavender results in a spicy, smokey, sweet aroma.  It's a relaxing and calming scent.  I like to put some on the balm on my legs and arms and feet before bed to help me relax.  It's good for massage or soothing skin irritations and dryness.  The price seems a little high but  a little goes a long way so the stick should last a while depending on how often and how much surface you cover. I love the bonus lip balm that came with the body balm.  I purchased my balm at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I have really dry skin and sensitive skin so I can't use a lot of products on it.  I also spend a lot of time outdoors hiking and other activities and even though I use sunscreen religiously I am still seeing some sun damage in the form of sun spots and discoloration.  This scrub is a micro-scrub.  The grains are very fine in a creamy base and really gets down in my pores for a deep clean without over drying or irritating my skin.  I use it two to three times a week to exfoliate and deep clean.  My skin always looks fresh and bright afterwards and the pores are nice and clear (really gets those blackheads) and my sun spots and discoloration on my face and neck have lightened significantly.  The texture and tone of my skin looks good.  The jar has about 2-3 ounces of a minty green colored scrub and smells like a typical cleanser.  It doesn't take much and a little goes a long way. I purchased my scrub at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I remember growing up my father and grandparents using coal tar shampoo and how bad it smelled not only while it was being used but afterwards too when it dried you could still smell it on the hair and skin.  It was so harsh.  This coal tar shampoo has a strong smell but it's nothing like that.  And  the smell doesn't linger on the hair and skin when your hair is dry.  It's probably because of the lemon, cypress, rosemary, and basil essential oils in it.  Also it's not as harsh.  Because of the addition of jojoba and argon oils it makes my hair feel extra lustrous and thick.  It helps my dry itchy scalp and when I use it I can go longer in between washes.  I color my grey hair and it has not strip any color.  My fella uses it for dandruff.  At first he didn't care for the smell but now he says he actually likes it.  He loves what it does for him and has declare it his favorite shampoo so we will definitely be buying more when this runs out.  It's a nice size 16 ounce bottle and it doesn't take a lot of product to use.  I have thick long hair and it lathered up really good in my hair.  I purchased my shampoo at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This novelty cupcake soap is so pretty and cute.  I took it out the box and unwrapped it from the tissue paper and felt like I was looking at a real cupcake from a bakery.  A lot of work went into making this cupcake soap look so scrumptious.  I got the guava tangerine cupcake soap and it smells heavenly.  It has the zesty scent of tangerine combined with the sweet scent of guava, mango, passion fruit, and acai berry. From the swirl of the icing to the cupcake liner to the realistic tangerine slice on top with a sprinkle of glitter it looks good enough to eat.  It's pretty enough to give as a gift or keep for yourself.  You can use it as decoration or if you can make yourself use such a pretty soap the great thing about this soap is you can actually use it. The difference in this soap and your typical novelty soap is this one has some great ingredients like coconut oil, palm fruit oil, safflower seed oil, and olive oil, oat protein, and some essential oils to nourish your skin.  And it's kosher and vegan. I would love to collect all the different cupcakes, they would be adorable displayed on a cake plate or cupcake stand.  I purchased my soap at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I was right in the middle of a really bad episode of razor bumps and irritation.  I made the mistake of using a dull razor to shave my bikini zone then throwing on shorts and going hiking for a day.  It was the next day that was torture. I usually use a cream made for the bikini zone to keep this from occurring but I was out.  By the third day the hair removal serum arrived.  I was afraid to apply it at first because I was afraid it would burn and sting but surprisingly it was instead cooling and soothing and I immediately felt some sort of relief.  I applied it a couple of times throughout the day in addition to after coming out of the shower and within 24 hours it was almost cleared up and within 48 hours it was pretty much normal again.  I love the all natural ingredients and essential and carrier oils in this serum.  I also appreciated that it has no perfumes, dyes, or chemicals.  The only scent is from the natural ingredients.  The only thing I would change is the description.  It is a serum, a liquid, not a cream.  It goes on like an aftershave, so it's easiest to pour a little in your hand and rub your hands together and pat onto skin or use a cotton round or ball.  But it really does work.  I received my serum at no cost in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This cordyceps mushroom extract powder is hot water extracted from organic cordyceps militaris mushrooms. Cordyeps milatris is a fungus that has been long known to grow on caterpillars in the high mountain regions of China.  The fungus basically invades the hosts body eventually killing it as it turns it into the biomass it needs to grow.  The cordyceps mushroom has been used in Tibetan and Chinese medicine for centuries most notably as an aphrodisiac and for stamina.  It's believed to have immune boosting properties and has been used to treat cough and respiratory problems, night time urination, male sexual problems, and improved renal function, anemia, liver function, stamina, improve athletic performance, and to reduce the effects of aging.  It's even believed to have anticancer properties.  Most people use it to enhance their stamina, increase energy, and reduce fatigue in place of caffeine.  Me personally I like it mixed in my decaf coffee with cream (it give it a rich full taste and texture) or mixed in a smoothie.  The actual taste of the powder doesn't change the taste of my drinks because it's pretty neutral.  I have more energy but it's a sustained, level energy when I take it without dips allowing me to feel focused throughout the day.  I purchased my extract at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Having been born and raised in the south I have tons of cast iron cookware, 5 skillets alone.  Anyone with cast iron knows that you can't just use anything to clean your cast iron without stripping it of it's seasoning because then you have to season it all over again.  This chain mail cast iron cleaner solves that problem.  It is made of high quality 316L stainless steel that is strong, durable, and doesn't bend.  It's well constructed and shouldn't fall apart.  It scrubs your cast iron skillet removing any stuck on food like nobody's business.  I was really impressed with it.  The links are smooth so it doesn't scratch or cut your hands when using and they say you can use it on other cookware too like stainless steel, copper, and glass. So far I've just been using it exclusively for my cast iron and I know it works on that.  It's an extra large size (7 inch x 7 inch) giving you ample chain to hold onto.  It came with a suction hook to hang to store.  The hook holds good on a tile surface or something similar.  I wanted to hang mine on the inside of the door under my sink but I couldn't get it to stay long on the painted wood surface especially opening and closing the door which caused the cleaner and fall. But that doesn't change how I feel about the cleaner.  I purchased my cleaner at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I love my silicone ring from Knot Theory.  I got the ring in grape and it's a really pretty purple color.  The ring is made of silicone and is very comfortable.  And it has some give to it in case your hands swell it will stretch some.  The edges are beveled so it is sleek instead of bulky.  Thank goodness it doesn't look like an inner tube.  Instead it's very feminine and elegant. I love the engravings on the inside of the ring.  It has the words Truly Madly Deeply engraved along with the knot symbol.  The ring is waterproof and hypoallergenic.  I like having an alternative to wear during hiking or outdoor activities, exercise, or anytime I don't want to take a risk of losing or damaging my ring.  These rings are so fashionable they are not just for substituting as a wedding ring, you can wear them just to wear them.  I love all the color choices and would like to have all the colors.  I purchased my ring at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This mandoline slicer has the sharpest blades of any mandoline slicer I have ever owned.  I was kind of nervous that I was going to lose a finger or cut myself changing out the blade inserts until I got the hang of it.  It's easy to pop a guide insert out and a new one in if you do it with the mandoline sitting flat on your counter, not so easy if you are holding the mandoline at an angle in your hands.  The food safety holder is large enough and deep enough to hold your vegetable or fruit to slice without it constantly flying off.  And the safety holder completely guards my fingers and hand.  I'm so accident prone though that I wear my cutting gloves handling the blades and inserts with blades.  There are 5 inserts, 3 slicing guides and 2 julienne.  The slicing inserts are 1.5 mm (1/16 inch) thickness, 2.5 mm (1/12 inch) thickness, and 3.5 mm (1/8 inch) thickness and the julienne inserts are 7 mm (1/4 inch) thickness and 3.5 mm (1/8 inch) thickness.  Like I said above the blades are really sharp and slice easily through fruit and vegetables.  I have used it on potatoes, cucumber, carrots, tomatoes, squash, zuchinni, and an onion so far without issues.  You are going to have a small piece of whatever you are slicing left that won't slice all the way because of the holder spikes and the large diameter of the holder but it's to be expected and is no big deal.  There is a storage holder included for your inserts to keep them organized and in one place.  I purchased my mandoline slicer at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I love this combination makeup remover face cleanser.  It does a great job taking off my makeup, even waterproof mascara.  I shake the bottle to mix all the organic ingredients well and apply to my face.  After my makeup is dissolved, I remove it with a cotton pad, I wash my face as I normally do by adding some water to lather.  It doesn't really lather but you can tell the difference in the consistency and texture. I removed it all with a wet washcloth and rinse thoroughly.  My face feels clean and supple.  I love that it's all organic with ingredients like extra virgin olive oil, beeswax, honey, cardamom essential oil, lemongrass oil, and distilled water.  It has not added fillers or chemicals. And because of the ingredients it moisturizes you face so you don't really have to apply an additional moisturizer.  It smells wonderful too.  I purchased my makeup remover / facial cleanser at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

When I first opened it I thought oh no it's hardened.  But the letter from the seller said this would be the case because there are no emulsifiers, binders or stabilizers used so the sugar would settle to the bottom with the oils sitting on top.  They said to gently stir it and it would be ready to use.  If it hardens, just add a few drops of water to it in your hand.  Don't add water to the jar or you will ruin it.  I love that this scrub is all natural and organic.  The only ingredients are cane sugar, coconut oil, aloe butter, honey, ginger essential oil, and geranium essential oil. It smells good.  It feels good.  And your skin feels amazingly smooth and soft like baby skin afterwards.  I use it after the foaming face wash as recommended and I use it one to two times a week.  If you want you can also use this exfoliating scrub on your body and feet.  I purchased my scrub at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

My sweetie is self conscious about his receding hair line.  I would love him and still find him sexy if he was bald but I want him to feel good about himself.  He has been using this for the past thirty days and every time I ask him if he can see or feel a difference he says no.  I was all ready to totally write this product off.  Then I remembered I took pictures the first day he started using the treatment and thought what the heck, let's take progress pictures today.  I didn't expect to see any difference so I was surprised at what we saw.  This is why it is so important to take progress pictures for something like this.  His hair looks thicker and you can clearly see the new little hairs where previously there were none.  The change was so slow (over a month's time) and subtle that we didn't realize it was happening.  Think about it, you are growing new hair.  You are not going to wake up with a inch of hair overnight.  It's got to start at the root, a root that has been inactive.  His existing hair is clearly thicker and stronger with less loss too.  I hope the progress continues and that it doesn't just stay baby hair.  The bottle is a three month supply so time (and progress photos) will tell.  He sprays it on his scalp after showering and rubs it in.  It has absolutely no smell and has not caused him any headaches or other side effects.  I purchased this hair loss treatment at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This all natural organic foaming face wash does a good job of deep cleaning your pores.  It is not oily at all and your face feels clean with no residue.  Yet it doesn't strip your skin and dry it out either.  I have sensitive skin and it is gentle and does not irritate my skin at all.  I really like that it is organic and does not have fragrance, chemicals, or parabens.  In fact the only scent you smell is from the essential oils, the sweet orange and geranium really come through.  It has witch hazel which is a natural astringent that removes excess oil and shrinks pores, aloe which is an excellent moisturizer great for wrinkles and fine lines, and honey which is a natural antibiotic, hydrates, and stimulates collagen production and cell regeneration.  Wet your face, shake the bottle, apply 2-3 pumps of foam and massage in circular motions.  Be sure to rinse thoroughly and pat dry or air dry.  I purchased my foaming face wash at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I used to have a wooden comb and my son would always take it and eventually lost it.  So I got this comb just for him.  He has a beard usually several months of the year and this comb with it's dual sized teeth can be used on your hair and beard.  Wooden combs have always been beautiful to me while at the same time manly looking.  A wood comb has a certain elegant and luxurious aesthetic and feel to it.  And who doesn't want a viking engraved on their comb.  The cool factor just went up a couple of notches.  Wood combs are not only nice looking but functional with benefits.  They are naturally anti-static and distribute the natural oils in your hair more evenly leaving smooth shiny healthy looking hair.  He loves his new comb from Striking Viking.  I purchased my comb at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I am such a fan of chalkboard labels. They are economical and cut down on waste.  You can re-use them over and over again.  Once you stick them on a non porous surface they are dishwasher and refrigerator safe.  When you are ready to remove them they peel off fairly easily. You can write on them with regular chalk or liquid chalk markers, erase with a damp cloth, and write on them again.  They are awesome for organizing your pantry, storage closet, regular closets, bathroom, kitchen, makeup, I can go on and on.  This pack has three sizes, 30 small (1.25 inch in diameter), 12 medium (2 inch in diameter), and 12 large (2.5 inch in diameter) all in simple round circle shapes.  This shape looks and works especially well on jars and lids.  I really like the bonus door hanger that was included with the labels too.  I purchased my labels at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These lids are fantastic.  I love the bright colors and the wide range of sizes.  There are five lids in the set and the sizes are extra large: 11.75", large: 10.25", medium: 8", small: 6" and extra small: 4" .  They are great for bowls, cups, pots, pan, plates, pie plates, etc.  They are flexible and when you put them on a plate, bowl, pan, etc. they create a suction (think suction cups) and form a watertight and airtight seal.  They are made from a heat resistant silicone (up to 425F)  and with the seal they form it makes them ideal for the microwave, baking, or on the stove.  You can also put them in the fridge or freezer because they can withstand as low as -40F and since they seal airtight you shouldn't get any frostbite on your food in the fridge.  These are really cool lids, they are so versatile, and I'm really glad I got them.  I purchased my lids at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a very nice leather belt.  It is made from genuine leather in a weaving design.  It's elegant and simplistic in design.  I got the brown V buckle  belt and it's a very dark brown.  The belt buckle is a gold tone. The belt is 48 inches long and will easily accommodate a 36 to 40 inch waist.  But if needed it comes with a leather hole punch tool in case you need to add more holes which is nice.  The buckle is easily removed and swapped out with other buckles if desired.  It comes packaged and presented in a nice box that would make it easy to give as a gift.  It's a durable well made belt that should last for some time.  I purchased my belt at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

1:22 MinsI love this little solar lantern.  We hike, camp,  and do a lot of outdoor activities and this is a cool little lantern to have when you are out after dark. It has a solar panel on the top of the lantern and charges from completely dead in about 8 hours, less if not dead.  You can charge in full sun or incandescent light.  A full charge will last approximately 12 hours.  There is a light indicator on the solar panel to let you know how much charge you have left.  The red power button on top when depressed once will turn the lantern on low, a second time will switch to high, and a third time will switch to flashing mode.  Depress once more to turn off.  The lantern in made of a tough clear pvc that is durable and can take the outdoors environment.  It pretty neat to use at the pool, fishing, camping, or hiking or even in the home or on the patio or balconey.  It is compact (3.9" x 3.9") and since its solar it is light weight and takes up little space in your backpack and adds little weight at 3.2 ounces. It stores flat and compressed and to inflate it takes about three exhales on into the valve.  It has a handle on each end to hold or you can hang it.  I would be careful about using it in a really windy environment without securing it because of it's lightweight.  It's cast a pretty good bit of light for it's size with it's 90 lumens led lights (10 of them).  I really like this lantern.  I purchased my lantern at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These tattoos are really nice.  They are easy to apply. After removing plastic seal place the tattoo on clean dry skin (make sure there is no lotion or oils on the skin), press a damp sponge or cloth to back of tattoo evenly for 30 seconds.  Let air dry before touching.  They last a good while without flaking.  When you are ready to remove, apply some oil (does not matter what kind, baby oil, coconut oil, olive oil, etc), let it absorb and soften for a couple minutes then rub off.  It will come off with out with feeling like you are removing several layers of skin like some temporary tattoos.  If you allergic to adhesives do not use these tattoos, and don't apply to sensitive skin.  The tattoos look great on, they are slick and shiny and look expensive.  These are high quality and are great for adults as well as kids. I think my personal favorites are the bear paws and koi fish.  The kids love them especially the bears and super heros.  I purchased my tattoos at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a wonderful quality ylang ylang essential oil. It's steam distilled from the fresh flowers of the ylang-ylang tree, which bears the scientific name Cananga Odorata and is commonly found in the rain forests of certain Asian and South Pacific Islands like Indonesia, Philippines, Java, Sumatra, Comoro and Polynesia.and Majestic Pure's ylang yland essential oil is from the first 2 1/2 hours of the distillation process so it is the strongest.  It's unfiltered and undiluted with no fillers or additives.  It comes in a large 4 ounce bottle with a glass dropper.  Ylang Ylang essential has a powerful yet still delicate and romantic sweet floral scent.  It has an uplifting effect on your mood and is good for stress and anxiety use.  You can use it for aromatherapy and massage.  It's effective in reducing stress, strengthening the nervous system, lowering blood pressure, speeding wound healing and prevents infection from spreading, evens out combination skin, helps seborrhoeic eczema, it's an anti-inflammatory, aphrodisiac,  and more.  It's used it soaps, lotions, creams, and perfumes.  I purchased my oil at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I have suffered from depression along with panic disorder and anxiety for practically all my life. I took medication for so many years and a few months ago completely weaned myself off all medication and have tried to go completely natural and holistic and meditative. It's a struggle and I can't tell you how glad I am to have received this cd. It helps me so much. I alternate listening to this cd on a nightly basis with the cd for overcoming anxiety and panic attacks. Mark Bowden's voice is very calming and soothing and he knows what he is doing. I feel like it has helped me with depression.  I sleep better and deeper after listening to the cd and I'm more focused and productive the next day. My boyfriend even commented on the difference. I had him listen to it and he said it helped him relax and he slept so deeply afterwards. Now he listens to it regularly too. The cd has three parts. The first part is the introduction that explains why we have feelings of depression and how hypnosis works and helps. The second part is the hypnosis session for daytime and the third part is the hypnosis session for nighttime. I downloaded the free mp3 versions to my phone so I have access to them at all times and to my computer and tablet. I recommend this cd to anyone who struggles with depression. I purchased my cd at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

1:22 MinsThe first one I received leaked causing the housing where you plug it in to corrode and you couldn't smell the essential oils.  I contacted the seller hoping it was just a defect or maybe had been damaged in transit causing these problems.  They sent me a new one and what a difference! I can't tell you how much better I can breathe since night one of receiving the replacement purifier.  I have this right beside my bed and the soft blue light and the waterfall effect of the water is so soothing and relaxing.  I really love this little diffuser / humidifier / purifier.
