Agent on a mission Author Rose Fox reveals her tremendous talent and beautiful creativity as she takes real life situations and transforms them into something purer while bringing to the forefront important issues and deeper meanings. The power and resiliency of the human spirit are conveyed here with such emotion as to be overwhelmingly honest.

What a great book. Such timing and research. This book is one that allows you to think about the state of the black condition. It answers questions that are relevant to anyone who would even think that there should be a difference with black lives as compared to any other life. The author wrote the book in a easy to read and understand way. Like a teacher each thought is explained and easily understood. We get to know finally that all lives matter and black lives matter just as much.

I know a whole lot about slave ships and their history. Mark Rich gives us a peek into this horrific criminal built vehicle. It tells us the who, what, when, where and why. The information is historically accurate and is told in a way that is easy to understand. The book gets raw and emotional. Anger and tears will flow as you learn more about what went on in those slave ships. This is a great month to catch up on black history. This is a great book to have.

What a delicious book. It is written in a clear cut way and easy to understand guide to help you create 30 of the best appetizers to date. The writer gives us easy to read step by step instructions. The pictures are colorful and the recipes are fantastic. I recommend this bok to anyone who needs to make appetizers for whatever reason. A good book.

This collection of sandwich recipes has every single one of our favorite sandwiches that we usually pay the big bucks for at fancy deli's! My husband is forever grateful that we can enjoy our favorites like, The Cuban, The Rueben, Pulled Pork, The Grinder... Oh the list goes on of all our East Coast favorites. I absolutely recommend this book to anyone looking for quick, simple, delicious meals!

This is a great cookbook, the recipes have photos to accompany them and they are simple made with easy to find ingredients. I enjoy Sonia's Paleo living insight and the "extras" that make it more than just a cookbook, but a lifestyle book. I prefer to always see a recipe printed with the ingredients in the order they will be used and the grammar and syntax needs an editor. It's still well used, well loved and one of the books I cook from at least twice a week following a Paleo lifestyle. Juli is a fun author and blogger.

So I picked this book up since it sounded interesting and I love a good adventure type story. I was hooked from the get go. Loved the story and well, being free was a bonus too. Look forward to reading more from this author.
I enjoyed this book more than I thought I would. I loved the characters and their interactions with everyone. There were a few times I laughed and a few times I teared up. Great book.

I love a good thriller. I love books filled with suspense and excitement. This new book To Catch A Killer by Mitch Goth has it all. Goth has a style that is both unique and captivating. He brings you into the worlds of his characters. Before long you find yourself immersed in their every though, word or deed. Visually appealing the story is vivid and crystal clear in descriptions. Do not pass up the opportunity to sit in the world of crime and punishment and see if you can catch the killer before he catches you.
I love to exercise and read books that is spot on. This book is accurate and very helpful

This was a sweet story. It's an easy read, with initial angst that was resolved without getting dragged out or continuously twisted. The writing was engaging and pretty tight. The story could perhaps have been fleshed out (although I like it as it is) and on a scale of great romantic prose, this perhaps only deserves a 4-star rating. However, it just left me feeling lighthearted and with a smile on my face, so I gave it one extra star.

This is my first time reading from this author. I did however hear good things about her work and anted to see it for myself. This young lady is one of the stars of literature in my eyes. She was not only able to tell a good romance story, she did it without going over board into erotica and the temptation that many of  our authors have these days to go over the top. This is the story about cultures and human emotions. The struggle between love and loyalty. What do you do when things are supposed to be one way but your heart wants it another? There are a lot of questions and answers within the pages of this book. There are a lot of moment where your eyebrows will raise and moments that will catch you off guard. This book builds you up through a romantic emotional roller coaster and it drops you off where you would never suspect to be. The book s fun and written in a way that is both entertaining and engaging. This author is on the top of her game. I salute her and give this book 5 stars because that is the maximum. If I could give more I would. A great and wonderful read.

This is a great guide to help you or a loved one deal with the reality of bullies. There are excellent tips on how to cope with this. The good thing is that these tips can be applied not just to young  people but adults as well. There are many forms of bullying going on today as many are bullied in the work place, at home, the gm etc. This handy guide gives you great ideas. The guide is written in an easy to use and understanding manner. It explains bullying and what to do. Ten good tips are revealed that sums up the book making it a worthwhile read. If you or anyone you know is being bullied, I recommend you read this book.

This book is not only motivational but it is a fun book too. It is filled with different facts about nature and how the different animals respond to challenges that life throws at it. The book examines our thinking offering practical solutions to help us live better lives. There is so much to learn from this book. You learn about habits of the Mayfly and the eagle. You also learn about sharks. Fascinating tips of living and leaving. You learn when to run and when to stay.The book is written in an easy to read and understand style. The author explains the examples in ways that are mind opening. The pace is fast and the tone is very joyous. The author knows what it is the audience needs. One of my favorite sections in the book is when I learned that everyone who is a master was once a disaster. This hit home because I recently had the pleasure of looking at some of my earlier movies (I am an independent film producer) and wow, it was quite painful to watch at times. But when I think of where I am from where I was, I realize that yes I was a disaster but now I am a master.There are many people who struggle with life's issues day by day and some of them struggle for a long time. The author introduces us to cicadas. These creatures stay underground for 17 years. They work and toil. Then when they emerge they are ready to achieve their life mission. I found this example to be very inspirational. All in all, I recommend this book highly. I give it 5 starts!
You can't go wrong with this purchaseThese stories kept me very interested. Some night I read till morning light came up.Very hard to put down

Bill duke is in rare form in his directorial Christian film Not Easily Broken. Morris Chestnut gives an excellent performance. Tariji Henson is powerful. The message is clear and not shoved down your throat.

Blue Coyote Motel is a wonderfully written book by Dianne Harman. This is the story of the perfect discovery in an imperfect world. This story reminds me of the challenges that are faced today and how there is always someone waiting to stop them. In the end this is a story of the human will tested and tried. Ms. Harman writes in an easy to read manner. You get to understand each and every scene that is played out. At the same time the pace of the book is fast. You are ready to turn from page to page, always wanting to know what will happen next. This well developed story is complimented by the well thought out and believable characters. They are written in a way that you actually feel and care for them. We get to know them, their motivations, their fears. I highly recommend this book and give it 5 stars.

This is a very good book that gives you tips in your fight of the war against cellulite. The best thing about this guide is that it is filled with tips that are all healthy and natural. It gives information about other treatments and the lack thereof. It then describes the healthy alternatives. The book also gives you techniques to use without anything other than your own hands. It explores exercising, mudpack and various other natural remedies. There are certain foods that you eat that can be beneficial. there are certain vitamins you can take. There are ways to combine all these elements to get rid of the cellulite quickly without a bunch of risk or side effects. If you are trying to get rid of cellulite then this is a good place to start.

For fans of a quick happy-ever-after fix, look no further, this is a winner. Likeable characters, believable people, with Lol moments, sweetness, and steam, add up to a perfect romantic pick-me-up. It's short as far as pages, but feels just right. I'll definitely read more from this author. Enjoy!

Ruby Cooper puts together a great vegan book for beginners here. It is easy to question how to go vegan if you are just starting out. With the recipes in this book, you can see that it is not that difficult to achieve. Rules and explanations at the beginning of the book easy to read and understand. The recipes do you feel like eating your meals for the day. Highly recommended!
This is a very good book that teaches you how to stop procrastinating and get things done. There are many suggestions to help get you started and realize your maximum potential.

Bill Ward has done it again. Another fast paced, suspenseful novel that has your heart pumping. This is a book that is about espionage and danger. After 16 years of being split from his brother, Pete Hammond must return to the UK to find out what happened to his now murdered sibling. This introduces us to a variety of interesting characters including his sister in law who he was once in love with and her boss who is very ominous. Ward has his own style in revealing his story. Though high tech and many things happening, we are able to easily follow the story and the motives of each and every character. The characters are well developed. We believe we know their motivations and what makes them click. It is here that the master of thrillers catch us and hit us with many twists and turns that make you stop for a moment, catch your breath and dig in once again. I am a former private investigator and love to figure espionage stories out before the book ends. I am normally right in 90% of the cases. Not so here. There are clever twists and turns. This is an intelligent book that makes you feel just as intelligent once you step into this world. Highly recommended, enjoyable book.

I read this book and got a lot of ideas and seemed to point me in a direction to help me communicate better with my daughter about dating. I found it had plenty of tips and will be an aid as we prepare for that long talk about dating boys.

This book not only gives you great instructions on how to fast, it also touts the benefits of doing so. Fasting for some is a hard thing to do. People don't know where to go or how to start. The answer is this book. The author breaks it down in a way that is easy to understand and comprehend.

Do you ever get stuck when it comes to ideas or do you ever have a blank wall that you run into when you try to find an idea? Well ere is a boo that can help you find and unleash your creative self. It has many tips on how to disvcover the creative side of you. The book is clear and easy to understand. It is full of ways to help you get started.

This is a good book of quick and easy vegetarian meals. this is an important book that can help you stay a vegetarian. The reason I say help you stay one is because we all look for simple and pleasant things in life. Life changes like being a vegetarian or gaining better health sometimes seem so difficult and complicated that many people just stop because it doesn't feel like it is worth the time and bother. This book gives you easy to use recipes. It gives you easy to understand directions and is written in a clear and concise manner.

The greatest thing about poetry is that when it is done right, it can touch your very soul. Timeless Clock is one of those books. a collection of poems that covers many topics. There are many poems that send you through a multifarious amount of emotions. There are several poems about love and relationships. Then again some of the relationship poems are not about good relationships. They are about hurt, pain and anger. There is a lot of rejection within these words. There is a lot of screaming, a lot of crying. They become raw and gritty. Ms. Poindexter digs from within. One particular poem that lingers in my mind is one that she wrote to her father. Let's just say he was not the best parent in the world. She speaks to her lovers. She speaks to the world around her. Each poem identifiable in the inner emotions of being human. There are also poems of triumph and achievement. Tieless Clock is a timeless book that I recommend highly.

This is one of the finest sandals I have ever bought for myself. High quality and durable. Comfortable and unique design. The perfectly fits me. and i am planning to purchase one more pair to gift it to my best friend. I high recommend Peshantis

This is a good book to start using raw foods for diet, weight loss and better health. The book is simple to read, easy to understand and goes straight to the point. The author writes in a passionate tone and his confidence is displayed throughout the book. This gives a feeling of trust and belief in eating this natural and healthy way.

There are many ways to improve yourself. One of the ways is through self hypnosis. This is a good book for anyone who is interested in using self hypnosis in any part of your life. This is a simple to read and easy to grasp book.

This is a good book about natural herbal remedies. This book is easy to read, follow and understand. These are the most important elements for a book like this. It will be easy to follow and put together natural remedies for the ills in life. I am a strong believer in natural remedies instead of drugs. This book is a great reference to begin the natural remedy healing process.
It is really good to read positive thinking books and other materials. This is a great book that teaches you how to use positive thinking in your everyday life.
This is a classic led by Lorenz Tate, Keith David and Chris Tucker. This is a movie that even today you could watch over and over again. there is a lot of great story lines and great performances.

This is absolutely one of the best books of 2014. I was pleasantly surprised that the book was detailed, well researched and entertaining at the same time. A young woman marries a distinguished gentlemen and it seems like it will be  match made in heaven. It is exactly the opposite. The story takes off like a supersonic jet. It coasts at first but before long we are breaking the sound barrier. It is well written and very visual. So visual that this reader was captivated and became part of the story itself. As a movie producer, I could easily see this book turned into a motion picture. It takes you on an emotional roller coaster. It is written is such a way as you are always wanting to turn to the next page.The characters are well developed also. Joseph may be one of the best written villains in a long time. Ceila is also well developed. The author created them in a way where we understand their motives,who they are, what they want. These are three dimensional, flawed human beings trying to cope with the realities around them. This realism made this reader care about the predicament of these characters. Hoping for the best. Cringing at the raw brutality of one. Shaking my head at the choices of another.All in all, a well written not to be missed mastery of historical fiction literature! I highly recommend this book and enthusiastically give it 5 stars. This is an author you must look out for.

First of all let me say that i juice all the time. Two to three times per day. I've experimented and have come up with great juicing formulas. I've read dozens of books on juicing. So when I run across a good juicing book, I become very enthusiastic and excited. This is a good juicing book filled with lots of recipes, lots of information. It is easy to read and explains things in a simple manner. The juices and smoothies taste great and are real. There is information that can help you choose which juices or smoothies is right for you. This book takes away much of the guess work as to which smoothie or juice to make for certain health benefits. I hgighly recommend this book for anyone interested in losing weight or gaining better health.

This is a very good book on time management. it is concise and to the point. There is no fluff and it doesn't waste time at all. The book is written in an easy to read, easy to understand way. This is a most important function of time management, never waste time. Similar to the One Minute Manager, it goes directly to the point. By implementing the technics in this book you will organize and save valuable time. Everyone who is anyone knows that time is more valuable than money. Your investment in time of this book can reap you huge rewards.

I'm not sure how I feel about horror. At times I love horror and at times I hate horror. The reason why is that I don't really know what to expect. In this case having read Joan Sample's work before, I expected nothing but the best. Joan Sample delivered on this one. This is a horror story that is packed with all the elements of a good horror story. It is well developed and surprisingly visual. It is written in Joan's unique style. It is clear cut and easy to read. It is suspenseful and chilling. Horror fans will not be disappointed and should pick up this entertaining book. But don't be alone and don't read it in a dark house.
This is a good FBI story. It has excitement and adventure throughout. The story is interesting and holds your attention. A good read to have on a quiet day when you are up for a good crime story.

This is a good guide that introduces the basics of natural healing. It is well written and easy to understand. Natural is always the best way to start and this is a good way to begin your natural healing process.

As a person who taught physical fitness and self defense, I know a little something about weight loss since I've been helping people lose weight also. This is a good book that will work if you work it. It is filled with great information that will get you on track. So if you are interested in losing weight, here is a good place to start.

Sometimes a crime can be committed that you remember for years. Other times a crime can happen that you remember for a lifetime. This author not only remembers this horrific crime but does something about it. As you read these gripping pages you et a feel for the mood of the country, the area itself and the community involved. The author writes in a tone that is serious, thought provoking and well studied. This is not just a book of opinions about the case but one that was well researched on all sides. Everything is explained in detailed. There are some shocking truths about this crime and how it relates to America and it's vast racial history. A good job well done, this story will surely keep you captivated.

This book was a very nice and quick read. Sometimes I just want to be entertained for a few hours. I am very busy so I am glad that it wasnt a long drawn out story. Every page had me cracking up laughing. The humor is on point!

I really never understood what gothic really meant. Heck, I'm a guy and not really into romantic reads. As I started to read I started to understand. It is a fast paced world filled with twists and turns. The images are so dark yet vivid. The story rolls by at a heart thumping fast pace. The author has mastered this style of writing and before long you are taken into this world. Fast paced and exciting filled with lots of romance and adventure. At times the book became hot & steamy. At other times mysterious. At other times scary. I found myself totally immersed in the story. Things build and then just when you want more, you realize there is more to come.In addition to being a great story the author developed her characters so well that you actually care about them. I wanted the best for Dante and Samantha. Even though there is an unhuman, erer immortal, I found myself concerned with what will happens to each character. There is something very believable and fresh about her choices for them. There are a few points where I cringed at the choices they made but I cringe at the choices I make in life too. A very good read, highly recommended.

Everything you need to know about aromatherapy is in here. It's benefits, how to work it and what oils are good for what. The author went through a lot of study and gives a lot of information. It even shows you how to use aromatherapy for healing or just to reduce stress. A little book packed with a lot of info.

There is a lot of great information in here about homesteading. Homesteading will change your life and put you in control of your own destiny. This is a book for those who are new to this lifestyle and want to change to it. It is worth the time and energy to learn about. This is a great first step.

Jessica Kong has done it again. This tale of two lovers from totally different worlds (literally) makes a bold statement about multicultural love and romances. The moral or lesson of the story is not an in your face type of way. There is no preaching or sermons, just two beings totally into each other. Their relationship and love is real. The obstacles they face because of it is telling.  It's a commentary on race relations, mixed cultures and everything that loves that is opposite on the outside. Our heroes must fend off many challenges in the entire world. The science fiction is intriguing. The story is engrossing. This book has all the elements of a great science fiction and romance mix. I highly recommend it. I give the book 5 stars.

30 days of Romans, 30 days of God's magical, mystical words. There is power in this book. It is a ministry in itself. Not only does this book has selective verses from Romans to help you get through and entire month, it also has explanations of what these verses are actually saying. It is a positive book filled with Romans to help you make it through the day. It can be used for early morning food for thought. A great way to start the day. It can also be used before going to bed. In this society our souls are sick and injured through the repetitiveness of negative information coming at us through television, radio, news, gossip etc.  This is a great way to counter act these negatives. Read it once a day. Meditate on it and you are done. In 30 days you will be that much stronger and smarter.

This is a very good guide that will fortify the discipline methods that you would use if the bible is your guide for raising a child. As a father of six in a blended family, I know how important and difficult it is to follow the biblical way of discipline. Yet it is the only way to raise children. Out of my six children two of them are ministers with a third one in training. Another child is an award winning independent film producer. Not to impress you but to impress upon you that the biblical disciplining lessons work. This guide will remind you how to apply them.

I am quite a believer in herbal remedies and healing. I believe that there are too many drugs dispensed in this country and that unless it is absolutely necessary, drugs should be the last alternative. In this book, we learn of natural treatments, cures and preventions. This is a book that everyone should have at home. Prevention is better than cure and this book has it all.

I did not have the slightest idea what Evernote was. Now I feel pretty confident of what it is and it's uses. The author takes us through the entire process of explaining everything that is Evernote. Te author guides us and shows us in an easy to understand and step by step way. She explains it's uses and how to apply. There is a tutorial in the book that also simplifies. It explains the many platforms that it will work and how it can improve your lifestyle.  A very good guide for anyone interested in learning about Evernote.

I'm very happy with this diffuser. It's cheap for what it does. Everyone who buys this wants to know how it compares to a Sto-Fen. The short answer is that the comparable sto-fen does work a little better. I'll explain why.The reason the sto-fen is better is because the sto-fen works more like a light bulb. The reason you buy these, is because you're trying to turn the flash into a light bulb instead of a light beam. This item is more like a semi-clear plastic box cover for the flash.. It projects more directional light out of the diffuser than the omni-directional sto-fen does.This item will still be better than a plain flash head if you are doing nightlife or night club photography. But you will lose more light to the ceiling than with the Sto-Fen.I still recommend this, because it's pretty good for the price. But just be aware that you'll get less lateral illumination with this than you do with a Sto-fen.

This is my go-to protein for 15 years. I love this stuff. I think the formula changed about 5 years ago, but it's still the best protein on the market.Great price, high quantity, high quality, and fair marketing. If you need a protein supplement, this is the product to buy.
This is the softest mattress cover I have ever used. Very plush and plump. It fit over the bed well. I'm very happy. I couldn't ask for anything more.

WARNING! This is not as advertised. It fraudulently advertises itself as being an LG product, when it is NOT! It is not a Korean electronic product. It's a Chinese electronic product. It stopped working after 2 uses at the gym, and it comes from a random company that doesn't support the product. But that's beside the point.Do not buy.

This little charger plugs into the cigarette lighter and charges the phone quickly. It has a cord that is long enough to reach into the back seat of the vehicle. The one thing I dislike is that the light it emits when it's plugged in is very blue. That's minor, because this charger does charge the phone very quickly. I recommend this.

This battery extended the use time between charges of my phone by about 4 hours a day. I get approximately 22 hours before I need to charge the phone again. Before, I spent 18 hours with the phone before it reached a critically low level. For the price, this was well worth it.

I love this car mount. It gives my phone a convenient place in my car, charges it, and let's me play music from my phone through the car speakers with the auxiliary cable into the car deck.I will never own a phone without also owning the car mount! These things are awesome!

I bought this waterpik floss tool because I hate flossing my teeth with wax covered string. It actually feels like it jets the water between the teeth and gums. I like it. My teeth feel cleaner and I don't have the pain I always got with wax string floss.I think everyone should consider one of these if they don't like to floss. Dentists always say we should floss, so this is a great option!
This book is a primer on navigation by the stars. It covers all the major techniques and provides a solid base for future study. I highly recommend this to everyone.

This book is designed to help people understand what working memory is, and provides ways to improve it. Alloway knows this subject very well, and has written many books on the subject. I feel like the exercises in the book do help, and so therefore, I highly recommend this book to everyone.

So this is an amazing find. This is possibly the best album I've stumbled upon in the last 6 months. To preface my perspective, I loved the EDM remix of Lana Del Rey's Summertime Sadness. That was great, because it put her on the map for me. I noticed that the original cut of the song was a slower ballad, but I preferred the remix. Now that I've listened to this album twice, I think this is a great artist, and I will start to look into her earlier work since many people indicate that her other albums are equally as impressive or better. Shades of Cool is my top pick. Highly recommended to download the select songs you enjoy or buy the Delux version of the album since it contains a few additional songs.

I love this book. It's very well organized and concise. Some of the contents Of the book I already knew, but some of the finer points were elucidated quite well and were made very accessible by the author.It makes a great refresher to grammar all of us should know. If you are coming to English from another language, the mnemonics that the book provides will help you with the conventions and exceptions. This is a recommended purchase.

I use this for photography jobs that I shoot. That included weddings and concerts. I take a program schedule and I'm set for the whole day.I really think this product is extremely useful for so much more an sport planning. It has the potential for 3 index card sized note sheets. One on the front cover and two on the inside when you flip it open.It fits snugly and it's comfortable. Highly recommended.

Like a lot of people have already mentioned. This citation reference feels very as hoc in terms of its method intuition. However, it is fairly easy to find what you need, so it is well organized.The bottom line is this is necessary for legal writing, so we all need it. There is an online version that might be more useful for casual users, but if you are any more than a casual user, you will want the tangible reference.

This is the adapter you need if you are trying to turn a mono audio signal into a stereo for processing. I bought the stereo audio to mono adapter prior to this one, and they look almost identical. To tell them apart, look at the number or black rings on the tip of the adapter. This one has 2, so that means the output is stereo.
This is the newest preptest book for the LSAT exam. Just like the other texts, there are no solutions, but this is the most current exams you can buy. Good to have to study from.

Even though none of the 10 LSAT preptest books have solution guides, you can easily find that information on the internet from other resources. Just be aware that you might not understand why an answer is correct and you'll have to do a little searching to understand why.
Like the other 10 LSAT preptest books, there is no solution to the answer key in the back of the book. Otherwise, a great study material.
These are great for studying, but they have the limitation that there are no solutions to accompany the answer key. As long as this is understood, these are a great resource for the LSAT exam.

Used these to study for the LSAT. Lots of tests. They're time consuming, but they're effective. The one disadvantage is that there is no solution explanations in the back of the book. You have to find other resources for that. That's why I removed a star.
Used this to replace the previous spook that ran out of line. Good price and works like new.

Ordered these to repair a book that took a fall. The neutral-ph composition was necessary to prevent the degradation of a $490 book. Repaired strongly. Book is back to new, and the spine doesn't even show any indication of damage now.
Great casebook for a course on Property. Editing is done where it was needed. Cases don't drag on unnecessarily. Structure of the chapters is logical. Recommended as the class casebook for Property.

This really is the comprehensive grammar of English.It's very well organized as a reference. I got this to better my English, and to have a resource that was a supplement to Google searches on the finer points.
Great case for the phone. It has stood up to abuse and continues to be strong, a year after purchase.

It is necessary to study the games from this book in order to do well on the LSAT exam. The reading comprehension is about the same except for the comparative reading selections, but the logic reasoning are a mess from this book. They aren't as well constructed as the current logic reasoning questions are. You'll have to find the reasoning for all of the correct answers. They are not provided in this book.

Chemerinsky is a great Constitutional law scholar and that translates into a great casebook. The pedagogy is well sequenced and the cases are edited well enough so the point and reason is tenable. An enjoyable to read, despite being required.

A good source of a thorough outline of black letter law for Property. Going through this will serve you better than using the outlines that float around from the previous year's classes. Definitely get this if you're interested in doing well on finals.

This is a great hornbook on Constitutional law. Covers every major concept. Everything I tried to look up from the casebook was in this hornbook. It's more convenient to own this than it is to check out the copy in the law library. Highly suggested to own.

Terrific hornbook source of information to accompany the casebook for the class. This cleared up some finer points on the law, and is worth the cost for every law student to purchase aside from the copy that will exist in the library.
These Emanuel books are great study supplements. It greatly assists in Constitutional law, breaking down the course into a very workable outline. Highly recommended.
Excellent microphone. I use this for interviews, low budget movie productions, and as a isolated sound source microphone. Buy a boom so you can make it mobile. Highly recommended.

This is the best hornbook on Contracts. I still use this as a helpful text. Useful for dissecting and understanding the details of all aspects of Contracts. There was not a topic that I was unable to find coverage of in this book. Highly recommended as an aid and a reference.

Torts can be extremely confusing when first studying the topic. This is a great hornbook. Not as famous as another classic torts hornbook, but this text is more modern. Helpful for dissecting and understanding the details of Torts. There was not a topic that I was unable to find coverage of in this book. Highly recommended as an aid and a reference.

A great addition to the library. Helpful for dissecting and understanding the details of the Criminal Law. There was not a topic that I was unable to find coverage of in this book. Highly recommended as an aid and a reference.

This is a great product. The problem, is that it's slightly mis-advertised. It's not a 900+ lumen output flashlight, but I can't really complain because it's very bright for the price. It has a very small hot spot, so understand that this is definitely more of a spot style light rather than a wide beam light.Switching modes just requires tapping the power button at the back of the light. Very easy to use. I'm happy with the purchase, so I recommend it to anyone who needs a very bright light for defense or home use.

Great USB stereo adapter. I used this because the computer I was trying to plug a microphone into didn't have a "microphone in". It only had a "line in". The line in jack isn't boosted like a microphone in jack is, so the incoming audio was very quiet when I was using the line in jack. This USB adapter solved that problem. Works well!

This album is so great with New Boss Guitar and Cookbook. Same style. There are a few vocal tracks, but they're nothing too special. I think they threw them in the album for variety. But the jazz is terrific.I love this album. But I love the Cookbook just a little bit more, even though they were both recorded the same year, I hink there is a slight style difference that appeals to me more. However: that's not to say that you shouldn't get this album too. They complement each other. These albums are classic jazz in its best form.

This was the first studio album by George Benson. It is a little more simple than his other following albums, It's Uptown and The Cookbook. It has a bit of a big band sound to it. The licks are simpler. But that's not to say that this album is anything to skip. It's up there with Uptown and Cookbook. I personally feel that this album has a slower feel to it at times. It still has its fair share of fast pieces though. It makes great lounge music or music to have in the background at a social event. I love this album as much as It's Uptown and Cookbook.The bonus track is great too! "My Three Sons" is a fast paced melody that is catchy and was worthy of being on the original cut of the album.

Apple has really nailed it. Great product. Good form factor, fast speed, nice screen, intuitive, useful. I read on mine all the time. Research, and use it as a productivity tool. I know it is good for entertainment too, but I use mine for work. Couldn't imagine that any of the competing products can top this product by Apple. Good job. Must buy.

The phone is great when it comes to build quality. It's light and feels premium, but there is no much different from the pervious S series phone, I am still using an Android system with the same Apps I have been using.I had used every phone in the Galaxy S series but this one has the worse battery life, maybe we had a bit less apps to run back in the days, but why won't they upgrade the battery life to a better scale?the battery can only last for about 4 hours then it is done, I had to get battery cases (which I always do for android phones) to keep it alive through out the days.besides the battery, I don't have much complains about this S6

This is an epic remake of the most exciting movie I have watched when I was young.The story is very familiar to the first Jurassic park as Claire, the busy park operations manager, is visited by her two nieces and is not spending much time with them as they wonder around the park. then a catastrophe happens and everyone runs for their life's because of the newly created dino. it is everything you would expect from one of the Jurrassic Movies and then some more.the dinos in this movie are so realistic I felt like I was actually watching real dinosaurs. the acting is phenomenal and the movie was just an all around success. this is a must see for anyone.This time, there is a hybrid breed, showing a rapid imporvement of genetic enginerring in modern technologies.

I have received this battery case as a review sample, and I will provide an unbiased review.After a week of use, I found this battery case an essential accessory for my workphone.Here are some basic thing you need to know about this battery case.1. 3500mAh battery, this would be good enough to provide an extra full charge to the S6, you may get some power left depends on how you use the phone.2. Durable material with an excellent bumper design.3. Sync through capability, meaning you don't even need to take it off.For those of you who only want it for power, you will have two more additional ways to take off this case with ease:Method 1:1. Put the case face down, locate the small tab on the bottom left hand side corner.2. Separate the two pieces of the battery case.3. Slide the phone out of the case after removing the top piece of the case.Method 2 (if you have a long fingernail like me):1. Slide your fingernail between the phone screen and the bumper on the LEFT hand side of the case.2. Pull the bumper away from the case UPWARD3. Slide the phone out of the case.Be gentle when you slide the phone off the case, so you won't damage the port (as far as I can experience, people who are hasty may get the case damaged)I have included a few pictures here to show the case, it makes the phone looks tougher and durable.

This case works as described, I have actually tested this case protects the phone without any problem even under water.The drawback is that this case does not have an opening for the charging cable and the headset, which is why I am giving this a three star rating.I would still recommend it though if you are going outdoor and expecting some harsh environments, this would do the job.A sample was provided for my unbiased commentary on this product.

Surprisingly I still have this DX 5 from UNU, which I got about year and half ago when I tried to find a case for my dads iPhone 5s last week. This case still able to perform really well, with the battery being this old, my dads phone was still able to get a full charge and I have not heard anything bad from him.I think I can use the term long lasting case to describe this DX5 :P
This case fits the s6 perfectly, a tight fit which keeps my s6 protected.Not much to say but it defintely worths the investment, as expected from a company with so many high quality products.

Great screen protector. Way more easy to apply than the plastic protectors. Phone screen is still very clear w/ the screen protector on, honestly I barely realize it's there, it does not cover the entire front of the phone but that is w/ all the 6 protectors so far. But I will definitely be ordering again. Also the shipment and packaging was amazing came earlier than they said and was packaged with care.
This is my second one in four years, lost my first one somehow and I just got it again.
Decent tool, not much to say

I finally settled on this one after browsing on Amazon for a while. I can say I'm very happy with my decision. It has a sort of cushion to prevent your screen from getting scratched which is really nice. As far as the lens quality, they're pretty well made. Nothing like the movie studios use but they still capture nice shots. When I first tried the wide angle lens I was a little confused on how to make it work. I soon figured out you need to attach the macro and the wide angle lens to get the wide angle effect. All in all, this is a fantastic product and works well with my iPhone 6 plus.

I was provided with a sample from the company and provide my unbiased review.The color of the actual case is slightly darker than the photo but, looks great. It fits well with the phone. The buttons and ports are all accessible.The charger cable that comes with the phone works fine. The case is slim but does not feel cheap. It slips in and out of a jean pocket without any problems. It feels good in my hand. It's smooth but not slippery. It has a high enough lip on the edge so if you lay the phone face down your screen is protected.I have not dropped the phone yet but I am also not worried though if I do based on how well this case feels in my hand.

It does make the phone a little bulky and slightly heavier as some may have stated but honestly, but it feels secure in my hand. I have no problem with that at all. It is just as sturdy as can be. One of my concerns before I purchased was that it would interfere with the signal but that is not the case. It is very easy to understand the mechanics behind the device. You'll notice that when all 4 LED lights are solid, you have a full charge, 1 LED means it is 25% charged and so forth. When you run out of battery on your phone, you simply press the button under the device to start the charge. It takes about 1.5-2 hours to fully charge as well.
Very adorable addition to my office desk, love it!

I received this battery case for my new iPhone 6 plus a few days ago and I started to like this case.The case is very easy to snap on and off, making it simple to remove the phone when the case isn't needed. I also like that it comes with an extra bumper, so you can choose which one to use with your phone.The battery life was very good, and I was able to get my phone to a full charge within a short amount of time without having to carry around a separate battery booster and charging cable.One thing I have noticed that the USB cable came with the case is higher quality than others. I tried to use the cable I have from other brand with this case in my car but didnt work, when I switched and use the Zvolt one and it immediately turned my cars stereo into an iPodI give a high rating for this case, for the convenience of it.

The Alpatronix BX140 is one of the best I have received so far.I travel often and use my iPhone constantly. I've tried portable chargers and other battery cases.This design perfectly aligns with my phone, and doesn't impede or reduce effectiveness of any button functions.It has consistently given me a 100% charge, (though it is still new). The protective frame has rounded corners that send the phone into a slide upon impact. It also has a velvety texture that makes it comfortable and secure to grip. An added benefit, the standard micro USB adapter allows you to charge both iPhone and BX140 without a FireWire adapter.As I have a few different battery cases in hand, I am unsure which one would be the best one, but this Alpatronix BX140 has done an excellent job to protect and powerup my phone.One note...it came with a screen cover which I tried, but discarded within days. The raised edge on the BX140's cover frame is enough protection for me. It prevents the iPhone screen from touching when it's placed faced down.I would recommend this for my friends.

4:42 Mins I have already done an installation video for the one I got on my iPhone 6, this video is made with my brother's iPhone 6 plus, again, I will take you through step by step on how to put the screen on. I strongly recommend this product to other clumsy people out there.To install:1. Start, by using the alcohol pad to clean your phones screen. Make sure you clean it well, any little trapped pieces of dust can create unsightly air bubbles later.2. Use the Micro Fiber cloth and dry the screen as thoroughly as possible.3. Next use the dust absorber and blot across the screen to pick up any last traces of dust left behind.4. Lay the screen protector face down (the removable film should be facing down) on the phone screen. Adjust the position until you have it just the way you like it.5. Take the guide stickers and press them over the edge of the phone. This will help hold the screen protector in place. You can use all three if you want, but I usually just use two.6. Now flip the screen over so the removable film is facing up and peel off the film.7. With the sticky side revealed, flip the screen protector back over and carefully place it into position. The guide strips should be doing most of the work for you.8. Use the micro fiber cloth to firmly press down, trying to keep air bubbles from rising. You can always use a credit card to help work out any air bubbles that do appear.If you have any questions or you want to see how this screen gets put on please feel free to leave any comments below and I will answer them for you.

Stylish cable with excellent finish.I got this from unu's website and ran in a little problem.The tracking shown the package got delivered but I did not get it, I contacted them and wanted to see if somethiny could be done. Their custom service rep. Jacky was so nice and sent me a new cable.The cable works great for a few weeks now.Thanks UNU and your awesome customer service.

5:40 Mins This powerful 3000mAh battery case provides enough power to more than double the battery life of the native iPhone 6 battery. After doing some testing on my iPhone 6, my battery was able to last almost a full three days with fairly extensive use. That is incredible for a battery case.What set's the DX apart is its seemingly limitless amount of features. The simple fact that the battery case weighs only a couple ounces coupled with the thin frame is only the first plus that I saw from the case.The DX comes in 3 different colors, matte black, metallic red, and a glossy white.Additional features of interest are:-A raised lip which circumnavigates the screen, this allows you to place the phone face down on a table and not have to worry about the physical screen touching the surface.-Audio extender, screen protector, and micro-fiber cloth are included-Easy access to all ports and buttons-LED Power indicator with color defined lights-Ergonomic design for easy hand-holding-No rubber backing (means no sticking in your pocket)-Case can sync and charge so removing the case is not necessary-The battery case is Made for iPhone Certified by AppleA couple things have changed on the DX from previous models including:The battery case now charges itself for the first few minutes then charges the phone, this ultimately helps with battery life of the battery case itself.To turn the battery case ON or OFF, you must PRESS the power button for 2 seconds then RELEASE. This helps with accidentally turning the case on in a pocket or purse.Overall, the case has been great so far. The design is flattering for the phone, no extra bulk, and I appreciate the thought UNU has put into their product. I highly recommend it!

4:48 Mins Here are my thoughts:Design: One of the main reasons I decided to purchase this case is due to its size. True to its word, this battery case offers a helpful amount of additional power in an extremely thin size. While it does add some additional thickness, by no means do I think that it is bulky or large. It still can easily slide in and out of my pocket and still conveniently fits in my hand. The round curvature of the phone case helps the aesthetics of the case and makes it feel even smaller.Another nifty feature of the case is that it has a secure locking bumper. I previously had a phone case that had a removable bumper before and every time I dropped it, the case, bumper and phone flew apart on impact with the ground. Of course, I would probably drop it at the most inconvenient times and you could see me scurrying around to pick up the pieces. However, the battery case is made with a additional latches (for lack of a better word) which keep the case attached even when I drop it. No more running catching pieces of a case.Function: Overall, the function of the case is pretty straight forward. It charges my phone by about 100%, that's two times the charge (or in my case, a full days worth of power). If you are not a frequent user as I, you probably could get a full two days worth out of the phone + battery case.The case also is fairly protective. It covers all the corners and sides, and the drops/bumps I have had with it so far so seem to indicate that the casing is overall quite durable. There is also a small lip that goes around the screen which keeps the screen from touching the ground when placing the phone facedown.Overall, I think this UNU new battery case is a quality case. It's thin, lightweight, and provides me with enough power to at least get through one full day before I need to recharge, which is priceless when you're on the move all day.

Very comforting grip I get from this gear, been using it for the past month and had no problem!
I can see Showtime features without being tied to my TV now . It's more than I expected from my Kindle and I am very happy with this App and the experience.

The reason I needed this product was for my mother who was having problems with her phone, turns out she just needed a new phone. Anyways the reason for this rating is because both batteries that were purchased have been working perfectly. No problems what so ever, love this product & definitely order from this buyer again in near future if need be. I also really like that the product shipped in time & the product still works & we have an extra one just in case for my phone since I have the same phone also! I would recommend this product & buyer to all my friends, post any reviews on Facebook about my purchase & how satisfied I am. Thank you!

Overall nice case.It has some weight to it, but that just make it feel more durable to me. It does not add much on the size, about a half inch lengthwise and is perhaps 2x as thick.Apple headphones fit without needing the extender at all! Only thick-plugged headphones will need to be used with the included extender.Got this as a review sample from their review program.
Too bad Nintendo put a regional lock on their devices, so I had to buy this Japanese one for Monster Hunter 4...Great devices, no doubt, but I hope they will get a rip of the lock soon.
works just like the original, worth the buck
The price was extremely low, this book costs more than 100 bucks in the bookstore in my university, glad I found this!
This is THE game I would buy any devices for!Been playing this series for a few years now and loving it!

This is a pretty nice case. I can't imagine needing much more. The case fits my new iPhone 6 perfectly. All of the ports and buttons line up, and the case is a snug fit. The little more bulkiness actually makes it feel good in my hand and the case is protecting my phone perfectly.Even though the case is plastic, the quality seems much better than a similar case made by Griffin or Spigen that I returned to another vendor.I am so glad that I got this case.
You will be addicted to this game... Honestly, the gameplay, graphic and the controls...I am loving it
The game is fun!Be sure to download the App from your google play or apple app store,Great to have 8 + people together to play this game
this USB is ultra-slim and very SMALL!!!I have it chained to my keys all the time just in case if I need to do some files transfer and bring my work home from the office

I received a sample from Ultraproof's UP program and provide an unbiased review.I would never thought of getting a waterproof case because they all heavy, bulky and very hard to press.. but when it comes to rafting trip, this thing is a must. I used this waterproof case during my trip to the American River in Sacramento last week and it was great! The main function I really needed was the camera, I was able to take a lot of photos while my friends from other boat kept splashing water to our boat. It served well and the case did keep the water as well, I dropped it two times in by the shore into the water when taking group pictures, I did not see any  damage to my iPad.I was a bit hasty to use it when I received it, I did not perform the water resistance test like they instructed. I am glad that this case worked.
Very accurate, place it at my bathroom to force myself to keep an eye on my weight...
Great smart leather case for my new awesome Huawei phone.the new addon is a great plus, you now can see a clock on the screen.
I really love this phone!!!I got two of these, one for my mom and one for myself.Fast speed, huge screen, this is way better than a Galaxy Note series..With unbeatable price too!

I've had these cables from their last deal for a month already, based on my great experience with this product and I noticed people are having some issue with their product. So I want to do a quick review and share with all the users out there.1. The plugs are larger than the original iPhone 5 cord, but for me that is a big plus. I don't have dainty fingers. So for me it's always been a bit of an issue pulling the plug from my iPhone 5 as it is such a small plug. In contrast the Protak plug is beefier. Much easier to grip much easier to insert and remove. The plug size might be an issue for some iPhone 5 cases. I have the OtterBox commuter and this Protak cable fits without any issues whatsoever, and I can't imagine a case that would be problematic. Still, it could be an issue for some.2. The cord itself is thicker and heavier than the original iPhone 5 cord. This might be a negative to some. Being a man it speaks to my animal instincts. The cord feels more durable, sturdier. Only time will tell if that is true or not.So far these three Protak  Cable I have gotten have worked well for charging and syncing. I have seen a couple of reviews where people have complained that the plug was pulled away from the cord. My suggestion would be .......... don't pull out the cord by the cord. Pull it out using the plug! And with this beefy plug there's no excuses for using anything but the plug.

I got the dress for my girlfriend from their official site(not through amazon). The dress is very unique and flattering. Since the fabric is stretch, it fits very well! She loves it! she'll recommend it to her friends. The lightning fast shipping is a plus!
my girlfriend is a music teach and she been playing with this keyboard since day one we got it, we are very satisfied and the sound coming from this keyboard just great!

I am a newbie in mechanical keyboard, this keyboard has a very nice touching feeling and my fingers won't be tired even after four hours of typing, but the noise is something that can't be avoid but annoying...
been using this to support our keyboard for the past half year and it never failed, recommending it! Great stuff.
my girl is using this to cover her mini cooper steering wheel everyday and it is great, good hand feeling, but the shipment was slow..
I have gotten this product for my girl because it can be used as a hair treatment. she been using it for a month and very happy with this.
my girlfriend got this shampoo because her hair is too dry, this has served her well. Will buy again.price is okay too.
got this earphone for my friend oversea and he loves it! the package was nicely packed and the quality is great! recommended.

I am using iPhone 4s, the battery life on it really sucks, I have to charge my phone all the time, if I forget my charger, it will be a pain for me not to use my phone a lot in order to save the battery. Having extra battery life is awesome, and this one actually gives you two extra batteries! The idea is very nice even though you still need to charge both batteries individually, but I don't use both of them that fast, so I can take turn to switch battery in order to avoid battery aging problems. For the price less than $100, this case is definitely meeting my need and expectations.
This thing still working like a charm on my company phone, just saw their ads again on Groupon, where I got it about two years ago, still working great!

I really liked this story, and the medical stuff feels realistic. There are some problems with spelling and other mistakes, however, such as "a physician tried to kill myself" (p. 263). Some of them are rather comical, in fact, which is why I've taken a star. Still, I like this book enough to go see about others in the series. Well worth a look-see!
These are SO delicious! The texture is like rice cereal treats, and the taste is like a candy bar. SERIOUSLY highly recommended!!

I found this for somebody who's had a stroke and who has great difficulty getting up into today's trucks. This is just the ticket when used with a step or a curb to raise her to seat level! This is well worth a shot for people with mobility problems.

This is a pretty nifty little beast, but it has a few problems. The directions aren't in good English and are VERY tiny, but at least the unit itself is pretty easy to operate. The operations are reversed from what is intuitive to me--such as the left and right arrows going up and down and the up and down arrows controlling side-to-side--which is terribly annoying at first. It's remarkably small, and I'm really glad to have the screen to navigate.HIGHLY recommended so far!

I kind of like this product for messy spills; it's certainly MUCH easier to put a piece of this felt-like fabric into the wash than to soak, scrub, repeat on a puddle of petrified goo, but it's also a little bit awkward to take it out because of all the stuff sitting on top of it. It can also pull out if said goo has glued it to the bottom of the jelly jar, syrup bottle, etc. I'm undecided at the moment, so I'll have to update whether it gets a star back, loses another, or stays as is.

I know from having put many cat trees together that they work best built from the floor up. I tried it with this tree, contrary to the directions, and it didn't work at all. I couldn't put the last bit together because screwing the piece unscrewed the other end. I ended up having to take it completely apart and rebuild it from the top, which then left me with a heavy, awkward thing to bolt to the bottom board. The weight torqued pieces into positions that didn't work with the predrilled holes, so a fair amount of cramming was required. Definitely a nice unit IF you can get it together, though, and I'd consider it a medium-sized tree--definitely not a skimpy little one. My bad boys have not managed to turn it over yet, which is remarkable.PS--The shelves and non-vertical surfaces are covered with soft fabric, rather than carpet. No shedding shredded carpet all over the place! Time will tell how well the sisal on the vertical surfaces is attached; sometimes it comes loose and dangles dangerously. I have high hopes for this one, though.
This book is nicely done and is a funny memoir of dog training and dog security. There are quite a few laughable moments, and some head-shakers as well. MOST highly recommended!

I really like this little game. The premise is simple--putting simple picture puzzles together, but the variations are very creative. The problem, however, is that it's buggy in my Fire 5, and it shuts down before or during at least every other game. I'm constantly having to restart the thing, but I still like it an awful lot. I'm desperately hoping for an update that will fix it permanently!
Hexlogics are beautiful little logic puzzles that are purely visual (color-based)--no math or language involved. Great fun and MOST highly recommended!!

This is a pretty game that works well, but there is NO help available whatsoever--no sparkles, no hints, no nothing. Because of this, it's extremely difficult; you pretty much have to stumble over the things and places that will move the story along. It's almost too hard to be fun, but I'm hoping they'll do an update that will help. There's a lot of potential here.

This one is cozy, but there are a fair number of mistakes, such as lay/lie (p. 14). None of them are repetitious, and I'm overjoyed that somebody finally properly used "EMT" instead of "paramedic" for everything! It's a rather fun read that plays well with text-to-speech. Highly recommended.

This app is very true to the story, yet it's not quite like watching the movie; it's more like a pop-up book, with interactive elements, that can be set to read itself. Even the voices are what I remember. MOST highly recommended!

I thoroughly enjoyed this book, and I plan to keep it for permanent reference. I do wish that there had been some mention of native wildlife in the safety section, but that's the only thing I missed. MOST highly recommended!
This book has beautiful, captivating photos (I especially like the cross-species ones) and plenty of real information. It's a handsome, most enjoyable book!! MOST highly recommended.

This book has loads of spelling, punctuation, etc. problems, but it's still a thumping good story. Most of the problems become invisible with text to speech, so that is a viable option if they drive you to distraction. The story is well worth the effort, if you ask me; the author certainly knows his subject for a very realistic feel. Love it!
OK, this one wouldn't qualify as realistic in any form, but I literally laughed at many turns, and I really enjoyed it.
This game is a terrific long-haul puzzler. Hints and skips are ample in the simplest mode, and it looks nice. It's probably too spooky for young kids. MOST highly recommended!

Disclaimer: I'm a medical nerd. This book is pretty readable although it has taken several days; it's not a book that even I, a medical nerd, can devour all in one sitting. It's WELL worth reading, and I hope to have some seriously over-treated people I know take a look. I don't have insurance, and therefore don't have an over-treatment problem, but I see it all around me. I hope this book will receive the attention from news media, the medical establishment, and the like that it so richly deserves!

This flash drive is SUPER tiny--about the size of a PIECE of Orbit gum (the tiny gum sticks). This is both a plus and a minus for me, but at least it has a ring for a lanyard, chain, etc. It also doesn't look much  like a thumb drive because of the size and  the matte silver finish, if that's important to you. It's said to be waterproof, magnet-proof, x-ray-proof, etc, but I hope to not be testing all that! LOL  I kind of wish it had a cover, but I guess it really doesn't need one if it can be hosed out, and covers/tops have a nasty habit of getting lost.MOST highly recommended!! You really have to see this little baby to believe that it can hold 64 GB of info; it's pretty incredible.

OK, I have a lot to say about this one. I have/have had probably 2 dozen Fires, all the way back to Fire 1, and this is REALLY different. I wish the geometric icons at the bottom were more intuitive, but that's my biggest complaint. It works, which is an improvement over last year's models. It's NOT HD, which makes it a little bit harder to play hidden object games like "Mirrors of Albion," but it's not a deal breaker for me. The speaker(s) isn't great, but I'd call it acceptable.Text-to-speech is hard to turn on, if you ask me, and it sounds much the same (OK, identical) to last year's models. The toggle off/on is the same as previous.I'm really glad I got this, but I sure wasn't the first day!!

These are SUPER soft and fast drying, in the manner of all microfiber stuff, and they're really nice. The color (mine are "eggplant") is a dark purple that is accurately represented on my computer screen. They are about 16 x 19 inches, which I think is a good size for the kitchen.MOST highly recommended!!

This is a TERRIFIC case! It is finger-pinchy when putting it on, but then it's nice and secure. It even has a little ring-thing, presumably for holding a stylus, which is a good thing with a smaller tablet.  The best thing about it, in my opinion, is how much it makes the buttons on my Fire more tactual; without it, I can't tell which end of the unit is which and so have a hard time finding buttons and sockets.MOST highly recommended!

We have LOTS of Petsafe products, big and small, but this one is a bit of a disappointment. It would be improved with 2 mice on each side, I think, and perhaps have their popping out staggered. Having only 2 mice makes this a bit boring. One good thing, though, is that a screwdriver is NOT required to get into the battery compartment. It does need 3 AA batteries.So...not a favorite toy here.

This is a fun little cartoon book for learning some BASIC Spanish phrases, and it includes pronunciation guides. It doesn't have complete (sample) conversations, but it's a start. I'd like to see more along this line.

This seems to be an OK unit, but there are some problems. Biggest among them is that the cheap, cheesy little filter doesn't fit very well, and there's really nothing holding it in. This is a peeve of mine because, in my experience, the filters don't last a week without some sort of frame to hold them in place. Secondly, there's no temperature indication (actual degrees) on the dial. I know they aren't all that accurate, but at least they're a ballpark, which is important when you're trying to keep pipes from freezing.Not my favorite...

These gloves say that they aren't for medical use (I don't know why) or for hard cleaning. I'm not sure about dish washing; my fingernails are very short, and they're fine. My guess is that they're OK for cleaning a litter box, too, but the uses ARE limited, according to the manufacturer. Within the limits, I'd say they're fine.

The furmonsters LOVE this food, but it doesn't love them so much. Some got a bit of diarrhea, which is why only 4 stars. Not that they can eat it, but I have to say that I think the bag is beautiful. :DHighly recommended!

These candies are absolutely delicious--very high quality, in my opinion. Even though they come in a can, each candy is individually wrapped for easy use. You might want to know, too, that the box holding the can is about a 12 inch cube, so the box is rather large by the time another box is added on top. MOST highly recommended!!

It'll be next year, of course, before we know the heat tolerance of this mix, but it seems fine. It was planted in the perfect 1 month long Fall planting window for our area, and it started to grow (little sproutlings) in 6 days with plenty of rain.  Terrific stuff!

This is NOT great stuff. The envelope-style packaging makes it easier to find the scoop and push it to the top prior to opening the package, but it is also impossible to close the zipper securely. The powder doesn't mix very well (stays lumpy), and the drink just doesn't taste very good. Not for me...
These are positively delicious! They taste like Ranch potato chips, with just a bit of a kick, but they are a lot better choice. I ABSOLUTELY want more of these!!

This book has some very interesting things to say; "so why not 5 stars?," you ask. Well, I did a "leap" much as described 2 1/2 years ago, and, frankly, it hasn't gone well. It's entirely possible that I may change this to 5 stars in time, but at this point I'm just not sure it's telling both sides of the story. It's well worth a look-see, though.
This is terrific stuff! It is an aerosol, although it looks like a pump. Somehow the smell reminds me of the beach, and it's super long-lasting. MOST highly recommended!

This carrier is very large and very open; in fact, it's the biggest of this type I've ever seen, and it's about the size of a medium to large plastic crate. The openness is cooler, but many critters, especially cats, may not be happy without less visibility (feeling safer in a hidey hole). On the plus side, this comes with a thin fake sheepskin pad, and the insert that gives rigidity to the bottom is unusually sturdy. As a species, however, my experience with soft-sides is that they don't stand up to claws or pee (corrosion of metal fittings) very well, so time will have to tell on that. For the moment, though, I have to call this 5 stars!

As far as I'm concerned, Starbursts are the BEST. It took a bit of getting used to this unusual color scheme, but the Starbursts are a terrific as ever. These "minis" are smaller and thinner than the original, making them feel softer, which is a VERY good thing in my book. There are no wrappers to deal with, either.  MOST highly recommended!!

Meez is especially fond of clumpy litter, and he gives it all paws up! As the litter toter, I'm quite impressed with how light these bottles are; I'm a heavy duty kind of cat, but even the 2-bottle case is remarkably light. MOST highly recommended for clumpy-loving felines!!

This extract is as good as ever; frankly, I've never met a McCormick product that was bad. The best thing about this, though, is the FLIP TOP! No more screwing/unscrewing or loose tops with gooey hands. What a BRILLIANT idea!

This is really terrific stuff; it's basically laundry perfume in easy-to-use pellets. I used it on my worst wash, pee patrol, and all I smelled was Fresh Protect! I couldn't tell whether these are different than Unstoppables; the container is identical to the Unstoppables I have on the shelf next to it.My only (small) complaint is that the light lemon-lime print was impossible to read on the white background. I might've been able to read the directions outside, but it didn't seem that important.This is GREAT for super-sniffy wash!

These are simply cute cat and kitten photos--no writing at all. I did not notice any photos being reused, even among all the books, which was a surprise. Some are similar, of course. I really enjoyed this.

As much as I LOVE chocolate and graham crackers, I was surprised to find that my favorite of this trio is speculoos, which reminds me of cinnamon grahams. The chocolate is pretty bitter and is best, in my opinion, as a sandwich (such as with banana) or the like. Speculoos is the only one I really liked right off of a spoon.All 3 varieties are a little bit gritty and are creamy and easily spreadable.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we expand on Scott and Harlow's story. In this book after all they have gone through to just be together you would think that it would be smooth sailing, ya not happening. In this book Scott and Harlow are still trying to recover over the loss of their baby. Harlow is coming out of her depression but it is taking time. Not only is she having her emotional battles with herself she is also working both at her mom's cafe and Indigo. Not only is all of this going on but she is trying to make sure that she is there for Scott while he is dealing with any and all of the problems with Storm.Scott misses his woman and wants her whole. He is constantly feeling like he is being pulled in so many directions that in the middle of all of this Harlow is getting the short end from him. Scott feels he should be doing more to help bring back the woman he loves more than anything. He keeps wondering if he should push her more or will this cause her to pull back from him again. He is not sure what the right thing to do is but he knows that he can't loose Harlow again to her depression like he did before and he will do anything to make sure that doesn't happen. The only problem is the rest of the world didn't get that memo.This book is amazing it has so many twists and turns I want to tell you about but as a reader I want you to experience them for yourself. This will be another book in this series that you will read again and again. This book can be read as a stand alone but I recommend that you read it with the rest of the series to really understand what is happening in some parts. This book is amazing I am so impressed with how the author not only writes about the miscarriage from a woman's point of view but also how a man feels about the loss of a child. As well as what he must watch the woman he loves go through just to come back to herself again. This book will have you on the edge of your seat from the first word to the very end. I think this book is amazing and would recommend it to anyone and everyone.

I was given an ARC of FROSTBITTEN HEARTS by Arial Burnz, included in this anthology, in exchange for an honest review.In this book we meet Jack and Aideen, both are elementals in their own way. Jack can manipulate water and Aideen can manipulate fire. Both are trapped in a place called a nursery. There are magical chains on their throats and wrists to control their ablitites. The vampires are concerned that if they aren't controlled they will rebel against them. The vampires are looking to create the ultimate elemental and they think if they bread the existing ones they will get it. Over time though the elementals are sick of their treatment and want out. The only way though is escape. Jack would never leave without Aideen but something happens to separate them. Jack will never give up on his quest to return to his love and claim her as his again. Aideen always hold out hope that Jack is out there somewhere looking for her.This is an amazing short story. It is full of adventure and drama that will have you on the edge of your seat from the first word to the very end. It is a story that will have you believing in the power of love all over again. I would highly recommend you getting this box set if for nothing else than this book alone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This book is not a stand alone it is part of a series it does end on a cliffhanger.In this book we meet Raven and Bear. Raven is a extreme adventure guide who does everything from taking groups on skydiving jumps to taking groups for long camping trips. This is what has happened in this first book after taking a group on an sky diving exertion, her assistant tells her there is a new group that wants to take an extended camping trip in Canada. While this is what Raven does something just feels off about this group. Raven figures when all of their security checks have cleared it must just be her overactive imagination.Bear is part of an elite group that started working for the government as a way to ensure the silence and security of all shifters. On this mission he is looking for a pack of wolf shifters that needs to come to justice before they expose all shifter kind.Even though this book ends on a cliffhanger it will have you hooked from the first word till the very end. It contains adventure, danger, and the possibility of something with that special someone you never though you would find. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Logan and Fiona. Logan is a man who knows what he has and is looking for a woman that will see past his wealth and see the man beneath it. One night after going to a bar call The Office after work he sees a bartender who makes him want to know more. Logan isn't sure what it is about this woman but he knows he will do what it takes to make her crave more just like he does.Fiona knows it is a bad idea to even consider being with Logan but the heart wants what the heart wants. So she thinks one night won't hurt anything and maybe just maybe it will flush him from her system. The problem with that is one night will never be enough. Plus Fiona knows she is carrying a secret that could divide them forever and she just wants as much time as she can get with Logan.This is a short story about two paranormal's and the struggle they have to go through to even get the chance of being together. I think the book is good I just wish it was longer to really give more depth to the characters. Because it is so short everything feels rushed. Over all it is a good book I just wish there was more.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Darlene and Erik. Darlene has spent most of her high school years feeling like she is less than her stepbrother. She feels like her dad and stepmom care more about what her stepbrother does and no matter what she does good or bad she will never be good enough. One day however that isn't the feeling she has when her father calls her and lets her know that her stepbrother has been injured in Afghanistan. Darlene wants to still hate the golden child but there is a part of her that is really worried. The real question she has to answer is what happens to them all when he comes home?Erik had a plan it was to be in the Marines until he was old and had to retire. This was not what he saw happening to himself. While on a mission one of the trucks incurs an IUD though the people in the truck are ok a second shot is fired in the general direction they are at. Erik thinks everyone made it out unscathed until he looks down and sees his leg in one spot and his foot in another. Erik has seen it happen before so he believes he will get the prosthetic, learn how to use it and be back in the field. However the military informs him that is not the case. Now Erik has to deal with life as a civilian. What is he going to do now that his plan has literally blown up? Also what does he do with the knowledge that his step-sister hates him, when all he wants is her?This is a great story about dealing with what happens in war and how all the members in a family might deal with it.
