This story really shows us also that people who have gone through some addictive things though they think they have it all figured out can slip into old destructive patterns very easily. I was very impressed with how as the book goes on it really deals with many dynamics in this family and really shows us with love you can see things in a different light. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and everyone. I think everyone can take something away from this book.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Willow and Kane. When this book opens up we meet Willow as a young girl who has been in the same car accident that killed her mother. Her father can't stand her and her sister wants nothing to do with her so what's a girl to do in this situation? Stuff it all down an hope that at some-point it will get better. Next we see that life didn't get better for Willow it just changed as to who was verbally abusive to Willow. After she marries the first guy to show interest in her she realizes her mistake but isn't sure she will ever meet anyone better. So now we are where Willow is getting a divorce after she caught her husband and sister in bed together. Willow has learned with the help of therapy that she deserves better but can she really accept going for more in her life. When she stands up in her lawyers office spills the contents of her purse and falls down from catching on the broken strap. Willow finds that there might be someone out there willing to actually accept her and give her that more.Kane sees Willow in the lawyers office and immediately feels protective and wants her to be with him. However the more he looks at her the more he knows that to get the girl of his dreams he is going to have to tread lightly and give her the time to see him like he sees her. Kane wants to give Willow the world but to watch her retreat into herself while she is around him is not acceptable. He is determined to get his woman and to make her whole again, no matter how long that might take.This book is amazing. It really shows us life can be better if we are willing to open up to the possibility of something more and something better. This book also shows us that you can't always judge a book by it's cover sometimes even the most put together people on the outside are the ones that are falling apart on the inside. This book will show you about love, acceptance, and the chance to really fight for that something more. This book is for anyone and everyone. It needs to be on everyone's must read list.

This book is a stand alone but characters from previous books are mentioned in this book but it is not imperative that you have read them. I would recommend them because they are amazing books.In this book we get Chloe and Gabe's story. In this book we find out more about Chloe's relationship with James and exactly what is happening between them. We were given hints to the problems that Chloe was having with James and that Gabe had some strong feelings about this. In this book we also find out who Chloe feels about herself and what her relationship has done not only to her self confidence but also the way that she sees her body.Gabe knows there is more to Chloe than what he is seeing her become he just wonders if she is to rapid in this guy James to see what he is doing to her. Gabe wants to rush in and save the day as well as be Chloe's hero but he knows he can't do that. He knows there is still that strong brave woman in there he just wants to be there when she needs a hand as she saves herself.I was very impressed with this book. I have been a big fan of the way that J.S. has written her books to show not only what domestic violence can do to a woman's body but also to her mind. I am also impressed with how she shows how it isn't something that will go away overnight just like it doesn't start overnight. In this book we see what James mental abuse has done towards conditioning Chloe to do what he wants when he wants it. I also like how she shows that any of us can give an help no matter if it is time or money we can all help make a difference in this growing problem. This is an amazing book that not only touches on what abuse can do to a person but with help how they can come out the other side. I would highly recommend this book and all the books that J.S. has done in this series.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Mercy and Koa. In this book we have the paranormal realm that we encountered in One Immortal. In this book Koa is headed as far away from whee he use to live because he has been thrown out of his pack. Koa decides to head to California but he decides that he doesn't want to go by conventional methods. He is going to let his cat run it. Along the way he get drawn to this little town that he has never heard of before. He doesn't know why but both he and his cat agree there is something or someone that they need to help in this town.Mercy has lived in Woodland Creek all of her life but she knows she wants something more. If only she could get her alpha/sister to see that as well. Dylan is hard on her sister but she has a secret she is keeping from her. Mercy wishes she had a better relationship with her sister/alpha but knows there is something that both she and her aunt is not telling her. The more frustrated Mercy gets the more she just wants to let linx out to run away from it all.This is an amazing book about love, acceptance, and determining what you really want most in this world. This book is an amazing journey that both characters must take together and alone. They must determine what they are willing to sacrifice and what they are ultimately fighting for. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

This is a good story about trying to do the right thing when all you want to do is all the wrong ones. Blake knows that he should leave Callie alone but there is something about her that just keeps drawing him in. This is a hot book that will have you wanting more.

I received this book book as an ARC for an honest review.Let me start this off by saying wow is this book amazing. In this book we meet Rory and Griff. Both of these characters have something to hide so when they meet one night by chance neither is sure what to make of it. Rory during a rainstorm runs from the guy she was with and jumps into Griff's car looking for a safe place. Griff isn't looking for a new woman and especial not one with baggage as it seems Rory has. Rory is a genius and can't seem to keep herself still so when she goes snooping the morning after her rescue she learns Griff's secret and is determined to help him anyway she can.Griff isn't sure what to make of this woman who jumped into his car but when she starts digging into his secrets he wants her gone. Griff has learned to build a wall around himself and almost everyone around him. He doesn't want to go through anymore of what he has gone through for the last year and is determined to push anyone away that could possibly cause that wall to crumble in any way.This book has so many twists in it that you are on the edge of your seat from the first word to the very end. This is one of those books that you will growl at anyone trying to interrupt your reading time because words take to long. This is also an amazing book about love, acceptance and finding the person who sees the real you not just the one you are trying to project onto the world. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and every. It is an absolute must read.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.What do you do when your bear is so lonely that it choose the woman he wants without her consent. When Andi goes up the mountain to spread her mother's ashes she never expect to end up in a rock slide or to go over a mountain let alone survive all that to end up pinned in her car in the water. So what else can happen to this woman well a bear comes to get her out of her car and in the process nips at her neck. When she next wakes up there is the ever handsome Mac waiting to ensure that she is ok.Mac didn't realize what his bear had done until it was already to late, but wow what a woman do nip at. Mac knows what is happening to Andi and he knows he has to get her away from him as quickly as possible. He wants a woman who chooses him not one that is forced by the mating hormones to choose only him.This book is amazing it is a push and pull of is it love or just something else. Both Mac and Andi are attracted to one another and want to be together but only one of them know the secret of why the pull is so strong. I would recommend this book it is a great story and makes you hope for that all consuming love again. I have not read this author before but will be looking for her in the future.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Levee and Sam. One night they meet on the San Francisco bridge. Both of them have problems when they meet on the bridge but neither are willing to open up about it. As time goes on we learn who each of these people are Levee is Levee Williams a famous singer. She doesn't want the press to know about what she is doing at night so she believes if she goes in a wig and keeps her sunglasses on no one will know who she really is. Sam however sees her not just in the I see a plant or another person but see what she is feeling. He understands her even though he doesn't know exactly what she is going through.Sam is Sam Rivers he is a man who started his own refurbishing business and is very successful. Sam is fighting some demons of his own and isn't put off with the fact that he and Levee talk every night without telling each other their names. However that changes over time he would like to get to know who his new friend really is. He wants to know the real person behind this strange woman he meets on the bridge every night.This is an amazingly powerful story about love, acceptance, and finding the limitations in not only ourselves but on those that are around us. This story has many ups and downs but once you start it you will not be able to put it down. I have read other books by this author and this is another amazing hit of hers. She really draws you into her characters and makes you feel as though they are your friends. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and everyone. This will be a book that you will read and tell others to read as well.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Zach and Amy. When this book opens Amy's store is closing due to the space she was using in a mall what bought buy another company and they are going to take the whole thing virtual. All of the spaces will have a store front but will not actually sell anything inside the store. Amy has always had a hands on approach with her candies and doesn't plan on changing that. When she sees on craigslist another location opening up she hopes she can find a way to work with the owner to get a space. On the first meeting with Zach she feels some chemistry there but when she finds out who he is she can't help but morn the loss of what could have been.When Zach first comes into the candy makers store he is just surveying the new property his family owns. However one whiff of Amy and he knows he has found his mate if only he can get her to see it. Zach knows that he hurt Amy by taking away her shop but he would do anything to make his mate smile again. All he wants is for her to be happy and maybe if he's lucky she will want him too.This is a quick read that was absolutely amazing it will have you hooked from the first word to the very end. There are some twists in this book that you will not see coming. I would highly recommend it. Everyone want a man like Zach and you know you'll be looking for him when you finish this book.

This is a hot short story about a teacher and his student.Jessica has been teasing Mr. Thomaston for a while now and she is finally going to make good on those promises if they can both get on the same page that is.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Iain and Skye. These two met at the university while still attending school. After Iain leaves to return home they continue to communicate by text and by e-mail. Skye has grown to believe that there might really be a chance for her and Iain to possibly have something more. However when she when she gets to his little village she begins to have doubts. Skye never wanted to be one of those love sick girl that hangs on for to long but can she see things rationally with Iain or is she domed to be just another heart break for this man?Iain is keeping secrets from everyone. He is very impulsive which more times than not get him into trouble. He is hoping not to drag Skye down with him but there is just something about her. He isn't sure now is the best time for her to come but the effect she has on him makes him want to try anything to keep her. However can he he rain himself in enough to keep her or will he destroy something amazing before it is all over?If you can get past the fact that the first chapter of this story takes so long to get back to this is a really good story. It is about love, acceptance, and finding out who and what you are willing to fight for possibly even to your doubt. There are some European references that you might not understand but it doesn't make it hard to follow. For example her car is and old 2CV I had to look this up I had never heard of it. It is a cute little car, just nothing I had ever heard of. This book over all is an amazing story not just a love story but about a man who needs to not only find out about love but what he is fighting for himself. I would recommend it.

This book is a really good quick read. I was full of heat and was a really good short read. It is a taboo subject so if this offends you please skip this story. Just the right amount of story and heat.
I wasn't that impressed with this book and was glad that I got it for free. I felt like the story was good but it didn't have much imagination. I would say it was good but one I would only read once.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Nautia and Riley. Both of these characters are considered specials due to the extra ordinary abilities that they each have. Riley is a naval captain that is the head of a top secret mission that includes Nautia as well as 4 other specials and 4 other naval personnel. In this story Nautia is a woman that can not control her abilities because of this she is a danger to anyone around her. Nautia's ability well she can manipulate water both on land and on sea. However her greatest problem is that her abilities are tied to her emotions and so far she hasn't been able to keep a handle on them. That is why she finds it so interesting at how well Riley helps her to control her emotions and in turn control her abilities.Riley knows he shouldn't get close to a cadet but there is just something about Nautia that keeps bringing him back again and again. He also believes that if he can teach her how to control her emotions than she could be the most powerful aquator. The problem might be though getting her there without her killing everyone associated with the mission.This is an amazing book about love, acceptance, and finding out what you need to make your life whole. This book has many twists. In it you will have a hard time figuring out who are the good guys and who are the bad ones. I would highly recommend this book it is amazing that will have you on the very edge till the very last word.

This is my first read with this author and I found this story to be very engaging. This is a M/M storyIn this story we meet Raymond and Diago. Diago after leaving a disastrous relationship where his boyfriend cheats on him continuously goes to the fated date agency and they help find his fated mate. However what he thinks he will find and what he actually finds are two different things. When Diago first meets Raymond he can't think he would be with anyone that he wanted more but he doesn't realize that it isn't the same for Raymond. The more time they spend together the more time he wants to spend with him.Raymond is just looking for a one and one when he hooks up with Diago that first night. However as things progress he realizes there is more to this man then he originally thought. However with his sex addiction problems he is defiantly not in the mood for a mate. He wants to be free to be with whom he wants when he wants. To bad fate has other plans for them both.What happens when the man you are meant to be with doesn't want to be with you? Do you give up or fight for a love that will outshine anything else you will ever find. These are the questions these men must ask and get answers to. As well as what will they do to keep if, if that is their decision. This book is an amazing love story. I would recommend it.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Ares and Zoe. In this book we find the question what would you do with the woman who betrayed not only you but your entire pride? Ares has to answer this question when the woman he believes may actually be his mate reveals not only his secret but secrets of the entire pride. Ares isn't sure he can forgive her but isn't sure he can stay away from her. His tiger calls out for her everyday but he knows he has more pressing issues to deal with. Since they were last together pictures taken by Zoe were put to press with a headline that could cause harm to his entire pride.Zoe doesn't understand what is happening to her but she knows that somehow she has to get back to Ares. There is this ever driving need to be near him and even if he wants to kill her she has to explain herself to him. Zoe knows the entire pride blames her for humans knowing about them but if she could just explain she knows she could clear this all up. However before she gets a chance all hell breaks loose. Can she figure out what is happening and be able to help the pride before she looses everything?This book is amazing it is about love and forgiveness even when there seems like there is none to be given. This book will have you searching for the all consuming love all over again. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Tegan and Ciara. When this story starts out we find a young Tegan running from a Rhino-beast and unable to call upon his dragon to help him get out of the situation. Tegan was dropped off when he was young and was never properly taught how to bring forth his dragon so when he needs it most he has problems bringing it to the forefront. On this day though another dragon happens to be flying by and sees Tegan's problem he stops to help the young boy and the more questions he asks the more he learns how alone this boy is. Grey is not the type of man or dragon to leave a young-ling on his own so he takes him home to be a part of his clan. Tegan is not sure what to do with such kindness but vows to make the man proud that he took him in that day. Years later Grey's clan has made a pact with the human clans that have sprouted up in the area. They will trade protection from other dragons for goods. Grey knows something has happened though and he is to old now to go investigate on his own so he asks Tegan to find out and bring the information back to him. On this information gathering he finds a burned out village the only survivor Ciara.Ciara knows the instant she meets Tegan that there is a magnetic pull that she has never felt before from either human or dragon. She knows she needs to know more about him, and the more she knows the more she wants him and to be with him. Both Ciara and Tegan know that they shouldn't be together, they don't know why but this is what they believe.In this book we find a story about love, acceptance, and finding the courage to go for something that you never thought you would have. This book is so amazing it will have you hooked from the first word to the very last. This is the type of book you lock the door and not talk to anyone until you finish it. I would recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. I will start this out by saying I have yet to find this author put out a bad book and this one is no exception.In this book we meet Storm and Raylin. Raylin is on the run from the mob who believe according to her brother and father have the two million dollars that they borrowed from them. Raylin never had the money but knows if they catch her they want more than money from her. She is carrying more secrets than the one of her family but who can she trust. She is always more worried about others more than herself in fact when she thought the mob figured out who she was she ran from her home with her roommate Maggie (girlfriend of Rafe from the men of ink series) just to protect her. She ends up in Boca and breaks into a home that looks very run down. On her first day there she sees a very attractive man working on a fence she can't help but stare but draws up short on letting him catch her. Ray is sure that no one will want her for her so when she does finally meet Storm she is leery of his intentions.Storm has his own secrets like the first being his real name. He is not sure what to make of this woman he just met but his feelings for her are so sudden and so possessive he knows he can't let her go. Storm also knows that she is lying to him for two reasons first she is an open book and can't lie to save her life, second he knows the place she claims to be house sitting has been sold and the old owners are suppose to come and remove their stuff soon. In the short time they spend together Storm knows that he has to find a way to keep this woman for always not just for a short time, but will she leave him when she finds out he is keeping secrets as well?This is an amazing book about love, acceptance, and fighting for what you want. I thought this book is amazing and keeps you on the edge of your seat from the first word to the very end. This is the fist book in at least a three part series. I believe that you will be able to read them all on their own but you should really read this story to understand who all of the main players will be in this series. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and everyone. Also after the author notes look for a short story about the first time Maggie and Ray get to see each other. Even if you haven't read Maggie's and Rafe's story this will have you smiling.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we see the return of Rachel. In this book we find that even though Jacob and Leila have been through a lot they have to fight one more time except this time there is more to fight for. This book is an amazing three part series all in one book. That lets us know where they are now and what is going on with all of these characters.Whether you have read this story line in their other series or not this is an amazing box set that I would completely recommend.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we get all three stories about the Downcrash boys.The first is Trip and Scarlett, both are fighting demons from their past and aren't sure that they can see love even when it is right in front of them. Even if they do finally see it can they ever fully accept it?Next is Maggie (Scarlett's roommate) and Tatum both are fighting their own demons from their past but with Maggie's she is never sure when they will walk back through the door. Maggie's ex was never physically abusive but was so verbally abusive the best thing to happen to her was the day he left but promised to one day return. Maggie is never sure if she would ever have had the strength to leave him on her own so if he does return will she actually be able to get rid of him this time or will she be stuck in the same abusive cycle she was in before he left.The final story is Annie and Logan. When Annie comes to live with Maggie (her old childhood and high school friend) she is running from what was the final straw in an already breaking relationship. During this time Annie is dealing with a lot from Jared cheating, to her grandfather fighting cancer, to her just trying to figure out where she wants her life to go now. Logan understand the worry about a grandfather with cancer he has just gotten the all clear on his own when they first meet so he understands her concerns there. However he wonders if Annie will ever figure out what she wants out of life and if she is willing to fight for it? Can two people who not only have their own hurts from their past but also worries for the most important people in their life be able to look to another for the love and comfort they crave?This is an amazing three story series. It will have you laughing, crying and all around connecting with the couples in this story, as well as rooting for the boys to get what they deserve as shot at the big time. I would highly recommend this book series to anyone and everyone. It is an amazing read that I think everyone can connect to in some form or another.

I received this box set as an ARC for an honest review.Holy cow this box set is amazing. Each of these authors have brought their best in these short stories. I have read some of them in the past and reading what they bring to this box set will have you not only helping a good cause but looking for more of their work.There is so much I want to tell you about each of these stories but being short stories I don't want to spoil them for any reader. This is an absolute must own box set. I would recommend this to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we find out more about Ellie and Jax. When this book opens up we find out what happened happened to Ellie after she and July are taken from the farmhouse. Ellie is taken to the hospital to get her re-hydrated and to allow her to sleep. The problem with this is all Ellie can think about is her daughter Hope, and the need to make sure she is safe. Ellie doesn't know what to do now that she is safely out of the kidnappers hands since it was her own mother who sold her to them in the first place. Knowing that she isn't safe at home doesn't make her feel that being with Jax is any better of a solution. However she finds out while living with him that even though she isn't sure about them as a couple this is possibly the safest place for her.Jax has always known about the boom. He and his cousins had heard about this from their uncles for as long as he can remember. However he didn't expect to feel like this when he met her. The day he sees Ellie coming out of that farmhouse is the day he knows that he has found his boom. The thing is how does he make her realize that she is not only his right now but his future as well. He knows everyday he is with her the more he wants to be with her. He knows to get the girl he has to make sure that she and her little girl are safe from the people who took her. The more he learns about these guys the more he knows he has to keep her safe.This book is another hit out of the park for this author. Jax's is the first story in the Until Him series that looks to be as good if not better than the original until series books. In this book we find a book about love, acceptance, and a chance to hold on to something amazing when life tries to take it at every turn. I would absolutely recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

I received this box set as an ARC for an honest review.This box set is amazing. There are so many stories I want to tell you so much about, I just hate to give away spoilers. Once you start this you will not want to put it down. Whether you normally read paranormal books or not this box set will grab hold of you and not let go to you read the very last one. Also this set might introduce you to some authors you have not read before. I found a few I had not read before but will definitely be looking for in the future.I would absolutely recommend this to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.This is the third book in the Fire and Steel MC book. In this book we meet Nora and get the rest of the story on Thrash. When this book opens up we find Thrash at an art gallery looking at both the paintings and one of the artists that seems to be in the gallery that day. Nora can't seem to take her eyes off the man in the gallery not only is he hot but he also is interested in her art not just the way she looks. When he tells her he wants to purchase on of her pieces she is happy because she is a struggling artist. When she is offered a commission to paint a mural in the club house she is ecstatic. This will not only give her money to pay her current bills but also to help her get ahead the only problem is trying to constraint with Thrash around.The instant Thrash sees her he thinks she is hot when he speaks with her he knows that there is more to her than meets they eye though. When he finds her in his clubhouse to paint a mural he knows he has to find out all he can about her and make her his. The problems with this is his club doesn't leave him with much time for flowers and romance. He also isn't sure once she knows the real him if she will really want to stick around.This book is amazing. It can be read as a stand alone but I would recommend reading the first two just so you understand all of the people in the story as well as why they are fighting their fights right now. This book also asks the questions can two people from different backgrounds really be together for the long haul? Or will series threats break them apart. I would recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This book is not a stand alone but part of a series.In this book Jacob and Leila have found out they're going to be parents. In this book they have to find out what that means for them in many different areas. For example will their relationship in the bedroom have to change now that Leila's pregnant? What will happen to the whole Rachel situation and can Leila handle it while being pregnant?This book is another amazing story in this series. We have seen them go through many rough patches but this just shows what they can do and what they can have if they stick together. I would recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Declan and Claire. In the beginning of this book Claire's ex-boyfriend is standing outside of a frat house begging her to come back to him. Declan hears this and thinks this guys is a moron then he gets his first look at Claire. Claire gets her first look at Declan when he helps stand up to her ex when he attempts to drag her from the party they are both attending. Claire wants him but knows jumping into something new is just stupid when you are trying to get rid of the current stalker. When Declan proposes just one night to make her get rid of all of the memories of what her ex did to her she knows between the beer and the hot guy she is going to say yes. What they thought would be a one time things changes when four months later they find themselves meeting up again. This time however it is under much different circumstances. Declan's dad and Claire's mom are about to get married and they are officially meeting each other names and all this time for the first time as potential step-siblings.This book is amazing it shows how love can find a way when you least expect it. I also like how this author shows how each of these characters has dealt with their grief over loosing a parent in different ways. This is an amazing book that I would absolutely recommend.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This book is a stand aloneIn this book we meet Elise and Jared. In this book Jared has watched two of his cousins find their mates. However Jared isn't just looking for any type of mate he wants a mate like himself another wolf. When Jared goes to a charity auction to bid on a blue painting for his cousins mate. He finds that there is something on the auction block he had never counted on now if he can just win her.Elise was volunteered by her boss when one of the other models is unable to attend. She knows his motives are not pure and wants no part of it so when another man bids on her she isn't sure whether to cry or be afraid. There is something about this man though that she has never found in another and parts of her are crying out for him.This is a short story about finding everything you never knew you could have and wondering now that it is within your reach will others take it from you. This book will have you hooked from the first word to the very end. Again it is a short read but packs a punch

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Angie Holton and Dawson Lex. In this book it starts out with Angie at her job as a emergency rescue dispatcher. She and her co-worker Colton and discussing a call that has just come in and how patient and dedicated she is to her job. Angie wants more though and has gone to a match maker to help her find her perfect match but when she hasn't heard back from her Angie decides to give a guy she choose a try, to bad it was a disaster from the first word. Angie is looking for love and dreams of a man that will not only love her but satisfy all of her wants to bad he is only in her dreams.Dawson has had a rough upbringing and when he father's old friend Tenner offers him a safe place he takes it. He spends his nights playing piano and when he sleeps he dreams of a woman who will love him just the way he is. Dawson believes this woman can only exist in his dreams because no woman would want a man with his past. When Eve comes to the bar one night and meets him she knows she has the perfect girl for him. Dawson isn't so sure this is for real but with Tenner's badgering he is willing to give it a shot.Can two people who have past hurt and lives that never seem to be on the right time clock find a way to be together? This book is amazing it is about finding that perfect someone and holding on for all that it is worth. This is like the first one in this series a fast paced read. Everything for this couple is on overdrive. However to read about them is just something you will not be able to put down. I would highly recommend this book to anyone and everyone. You will not be disappointed

I received this book as an ARC for and honest review. This book is not a stand alone this is the first part in a three part series.In this book we have both Jacob and Leila back for another round but as Jacob isn't sure that he has his Leila back she is getting sick of telling him she is just fine. Leila has a plan she will show her husband how ok she really is just because they might be a little late to their appointment sometimes you gotta do what you gotta do. Leila feels like they are finally getting back into a good place however that is just about to change. When a person from their past comes back this will either drive them together or force them apart.Jacob knows that he loves his wife and only wants what is best for her. Finally he also realizes what she really needs is him being the dom that she knows and loves. The problem though when someone comes back from their past he has to wonder will this be the person to take his wife away from him forever?This book ends on a cliffhanger but the beginning of this story will draw you in and not let go till the very last word. I would highly recommend it to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This is the final book in a series it is not meant as a stand alone.They are all finally safe or are they. Now that Chad is off on the run Liam believes that it is time to separate them from Chad to make it look like they have nothing to hide. Liam is also determined to have the woman of his dreams tied to his side. How does he do that well marry her of course if only they can find the time and get to a place where it doesn't feel like they are constantly being threatened. Liam knows the only way to make his woman safe is to give her his name and make sure no one can ever touch her again. Without locking her in a room he knows this will be a stretch, and she will fight him like a mad cat. He also knows he can't live without her.Amy wants to be with Liam now more than ever. She feels like every time she falls he is the safe place to land. Amy knows that she wouldn't be here with out Liam and knows he wants her as his wife she just has to decide is she ready to make that final step with him. Also if she does will Liam ever be safe or will he be like all the other people that she has loved in her life, dead?This book has many more twists and turns before you get to the end of it. It will take you on that roller-coaster that we have enjoyed in the previous 3 books in this series. Will they get that HEA you will have to read to find out, but nothing with this couple is ever smooth sailing. I would highly recommend this conclusion. You will be hooked from the first word to the very end. I would say it is a must read for anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This is part of a series not meant as a stand alone.In this book we finally learn the big secret that Henry is keeping from Monica. In this book we also have Monica and Henry finally confessing their true feelings for one another and in this book we also find out what kind of Dom Henry really is. At the end of the last book we find out what type of dom Henry is with Monica. However in this book Henry's sister Evangeline makes sure that she sees a little more of the person he is trying to keep from her. Eva isn't sure if this is to protect her or to make sure not to scare her away from him. Monica knows the root of all of their problems and if she could just get rid of him all of them would be happier.Henry wants Monica he has never made this a secret in this book we find out how deep his feelings go as well as how long he has had them. Henry knows keeping the secret from Monica had the possibility of driving a wedge between them the question he has now is can he fix that wedge before it becomes a full blown un-repairable problem.In this third and final book we find a book that is full of love, acceptance, and giving the person you love just what they need to bloom right before you eyes. I would recommend this book it is an amazing love story.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This is part of a series and not meant as stand alone.In this book Monica and Henry are back and still having some rocky times. In this book Monica finally leaves the chatoe to spend some quality time with Henry but while there some of her past comes back. Monica goes through things that will bring up parts of her past. Will she tell Henry about it or try and bury it like everything else that is to painful to think about? Monica has to start making some hard decisions in this book. For instance is she going to be ruled by her past or is she looking to open up for her future.Henry knows that he is still keeping secrets from Monica but if he tells her will this be the end of them? He knows that there is something more to them than just a fleeting romance but first he has to get Monica to see it. He wants her all for himself and he wants all of her in this book he learns a little more about what she is hiding and has to decide if he can ever be enough for her.In this book we see a little more about each of these characters and we find out where their breaking points just might be. This book will be completed in the next book. There is so much I want to tell you but feel everyone should experience it for themselves.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest reivew.The question for this book what would you do if you believed that the person you loved the most never really loved you? Would you stay and fight for the relationship or would you move on to greener pastures?In this book we meet Evie and her husband Joe. Evie has finally had the straw that broke the camel's back. They have been married for 13 years and though she can't prove it she is quite sure that Joe has never been faithful to her. When Evie finds out that Joe has been unemployed for 3 weeks and he never bothered to tell her. After being laid up from a surgery she knows what she needs now is to figure out what she wants her future to look like. So she goes back to where it all started her grandmother's cabin. On her first day there she meets a younger man named Jake and he stirs things in her she hasn't felt in years but does she go with them or choose to stay faithful to a husband she isn't sure ever was to her.Joe knows he needs to be completely honest with his wife but he is afraid if he is this will be the time that she leaves him for good. Problem is before he can make this decision and get home to tell her someone does it for him and his wife is gone. Joe goes off to try and make things right with his wife. Along the way Joe finally learns some hard lesson about things he has done and how people see him. The first person he meets is a 17 year old girl named Lisa who is pregnant and looking to tell the father. Joe remembers being in this situation and is trying to give the girl advice while remembering what his own wife must have gone through. Next is his sister and his old best friend both of them aren't sure he is really the man for Evie and maybe he should be man enough to finally let her be and have a good life. Joe realizes that he has made mistakes and wonders if even though he is turning over a new leaf will his wife still want him?This story bounces between the past and what is currently happening with this couple and the people they interact with. It shows what some people are willing to do to keep love alive. I would recommend this book it is good.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.This is a stand alone but a short story. In this book we meet Sarah and Sloan. Sarah is a witch that can't control her magic but knows she is meant to be in this library. She needs to keep everything calm to make sure that she has no flare ups. Sloan how ever disturbs her on many levels and no matter how she tries to hold it in her magic is trying to find it's way out.Sloan knows there is something special about Sarah but he knows that he is keeping secret of his own. If only he can get the answers he needs before everything goes bad. The more he he finds out the more he know that not only does he want the answers he needs to protect everyone but the more he wants Sarah. He will let no one or nothing stand in his way.This book is a great stand alone it is a very quick read I would recommend it to anyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Bull and Lily. Lily is on the run from her family and one day when she has to deliver her work to the client she decides to take a short cut below the stadium they are holding the rodeo. While crossing this open area she hears a sound that makes her freeze. It is an actual Bull. Bull jumps in the ring and stops this behemoth from charging her and harming her. Lily is shocked how amazing this man looks but knows that she must stay alone. With her past she knows that this is safest for everyone. To bad no one ever gave Bull that memo.Bull takes one look at Lily and knows that he wants her. The problem is nailing her down. She is like a wild filly that needs to be roped and saddled if only he can keep her in one place to do this. Bull knows there is something special between them but there is something that keeps making Lily run. Once Bull figures out what will make her stick around if even just for a short time he uses it to his advantage over and over.This book has many twists and turns you know there are bad guys, but there are degrees of bad guys in this book which will have you hooked from the first word to the very end. This book has you finding your inner strength and finding that sometimes the greatest loves are the ones that will stick with you through thick and thin. Also this book is about not worrying about what size you are because real love doesn't see it it sees the person in side. I would recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Reid Bennett a wolf who has a reputation for violence, and we meet Evelyn Archer a bear who believes that there is should be more than fear and violence for her people. Evelyn risks everything including her own life to make a call to the Southeast Itan to let him know what is happening in their den. Little did she know that they would send Reid Bennett a wolf know for violence. However every-time she is is around Reid violence is not the main feeling she gets from him. Loyalty, protection and desire are the main emotions that she gets when he looks at her but will this be the same for the rest of the den her bear believes it will.Reid believes in justice and that offenders must be punished even if it is in a very brutal way. However the first time he sees Evelyn he knows that there is so much more to her. He is also greatly angered by what has happened to her. The other thing he realizes is that the more time he spends with this woman the more he believes she just might be his mate. Can she accept him though? He doesn't just mean the nice parts  he reserves just for her but all of him the good and the bad?This is an amazing book about love, acceptance, and finding peace when you never thought it would be possible. This is a great love story that not only touches the main characters in this book but the entire community. I would highly recommend it to anyone and everyone.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Bryce and Susie. Bryce and Susie are Best Man and Maid of Honor at their friends wedding and have never met before so when their friends talk about them they are both sure they have just been given the person no one else wants to be with at the wedding due to looks or possibly personality. Susie has always looked after her self and over the years that has included her best friend Milly. Both Susie and Milly are nurses but for different reasons. When Milly was younger she was diagnosed with cancer Susie also lost her mother to cancer and so for her she wants to make the world better in this little way by helping cancer patients. Susie doesn't know what to make of Bryce, but she does know she is attracted to him if only she could keep all the dumb stuff from coming out of her mouth.Bryce doesn't know what to do with Susie at first but he knows that he feels something amazing for this woman. Once Bryce has made up his mind there is no stopping him from getting exactly what he wants and what he wants is Susie. Bryce wants all of Susie though and is not sure at times how to break through her tough outer shell to get to that soft middle that he knows is there. Bryce knows that his time in the corp. taught him to never give up though and this is one thing he will fight to the death for.This book is good the only dilemma I have with it is how fast everything goes. It seems like they meet, they are in love and then they are together so quickly. I would recommend it just expect everything to happen in supper speed.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Noah and Brianna. When this story opens up Brianna feels like she is being watched and realizes that the place she calls home is not longer safe. So she will need to change her identity again and run again. After that first chapter we find out the story of how Noah and Brianna meet and how they have come to find each other after that first meeting. We also learn why Brianna is on the run from someone that isn't sure is the only person she needs to fear.Noah is part of Delta Force and meets Brianna in a remote secret location. While there he is leery that all she if after is their life stories for a story but realizes that Brianna has real compassion and is looking to make sure this story really shows that these men are more than just a story. Just as they seem to be finding their groove together in this barren place Noah is call out for another mission. While there he finds himself making some hard decisions about where he wants his life to go. His first stop get his woman back and make sure she never leaves him again. Sometimes the best laid plans don't always go as planned.In this book we have love, acceptance, trust, intrigue and fighting for that perfect person. You will laugh at times and cry at times in this book. Ok so all the sappy stuff is said now this book will have you on the edge of your seat you will not want to put it down for anything. This book will have you wondering who is behind it all till the very end. There is so much I want to tell you about this book but hate to ruin it for any other readers. I will say pick up your copy of this book today you will not be disappointed.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we get to find out more about Griff and we meet Sophia. In this story we learn why Griff is so quite and how he came to be with Storm. We also learn about all of the infighting since the death of Marcus and what it is doing to not only Scott but Griff as well. Griff is a private man but in this book he learns where his real family lies and what he will do for them. Griff is given the gift of a woman who not only sees him for the bad-ass he is but also the side that wants a family of his own one day. However in this quest Griff got burned really bad by a woman and is now leery of all woman and figures the one and done method is all he is after. That is until he see a woman one night that have him wanting to know more about her.Sophia hasn't had a life filled with love and flowers she has had a hard time. 6 years only Sophia found a piece of her family that she had never known existed in a sister named Megan. Sophia has always wanted to love and be loved and if she can have a family to call her own that would be the icing on the cake. However finding that love has left some scars that have her looking for the real thing or nothing at all. So when Sophia meets Griff one night she learns he has his one and done method is all he is after and she is looking for the real thing.The question then is asked can two people who have been hurt in the past really find the future they are looking for in each other? As well as with all the storms (no pun intended) brewing in the club can Griff and Sofia find a way to balance a possible future both inside and outside the club?This book will have you hooked from the first word to the very end. It is a stand alone but I would recommend reading the other books in this series to make some of the references make sense because they occur in other books. There is so many things that happen in this book that I want to tell you about but as a reader I want to find them out on my own not have someone tell me about it and be looking for it and miss other great parts in a story. Pick up your copy today you will not be disappointed.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This is not a stand-alone it is the third and final book in the series.What would you do if you felt like you had lost everything? In this book Liam is back and know he has to figure out what he wants from his life and how he is going to get it. Liam is still reeling in the beginning of this book he wants Tria back but knows after what he said to her it is going to be a fight to get her. As things start to unravel for him the more he knows that to get things completely on track he needs her. On of Liam's largest fights is to tell Tria everything. He never wanted to go there again but to get healthy and to get his girl back he will have to bare it all to her.Tria isn't sure what to do about Liam she knows she misses him but with what he said to her at the end of the second book she isn't sure she can take him back. She knows there is more than herself to consider in all of this. However when he opens up to her about everything she isn't sure this isn't just a stunt to get her back.This book will push both of them to their limits and will show them exactly what they are fighting for. I think it has and amazing story with an amazing ending that will have you cheering this author for a perfect ending for this couple. This book needs to be on everyone's must read list as well as the entire series.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This book is not a stand alone it is the third and final book in the Forbidden Series.In this book everyone is back. In this book Josephine is back and deciding that one she needs her best friend back and will even go to her to get her back and two she needs to decided what she is going to do with Rebel. Joe isn't sure how she feels and if she will be willing to give him another try or if the pictures that she received are the straw that broke the camel's back and it is time to be done with him. Joe knows the pull that Rebel has can be her undoing so is being near him at all a good thing? What if Ranson decides he wants to try for her heart on more time? Will she go for something even thought she can't put her whole heart into it or will she go after what her heart wants?Rebel doesn't know what is going on but having Joe back in his space is a start towards that right direction. After all the calls he has made to her that she hasn't returned he just wants to know what is going on. He knows something took his pussycat away from him and he will fight to get his girl back even if it is from those closest to him.This book has many twists and turns in it at times you don't know who are the good guys and who are the bad guys. This book will have you hooked from the first word to the very end. I recommend this book to anyone and everyone. This is an amazing series and this book will help wrap it all up for you.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Howard (Hawk) and Alexis (Alex). Hawk and Alex have been friends since they were little but when they were in high school their feelings changed but neither had the guts to tell the other. A couple of weeks before graduation Hawks mother dies of a heart attack or at least that is what the official report says but he knows it was something more and confronts his father about what he learns. His father threatens him and makes sure he leaves town the hard way. 6 Years later he is back and ready to finally claim his woman and make sure his father feels his full wrath.Alex missed and needed Hawk all those years that he has been gone, but there is no changing the past now. Alex knows she has to stand on her own two feet and stand up for herself and her sister. The appearance of Hawk can mean nothing now. As long as she keeps telling herself that right.The beginning of this book was a little hard for me to get into but one I was able to really get into the heart of the characters I was unable to put it down. This book has many twists and turns to it. It will have you on the edge of your seat to the very end as well as saying who did what? There is so much I want to tell you about this book but feel it would ruin the overall story-line the author is going for. This book is part mystery and part romance. Over all it is an amazing read and I would recommend it.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review.In this book we meet Vanessa and Erun. Erun sees Vanessa and Tabitha on the street and believes that Vanessa is a bad mother because her daughter runs from her and runs towards traffic. He also believes that the child is Ujal and there for should not be allowed to be with Vanessa any more. He yells at her calls her names and all round attacks Vanessa's character without getting all the facts. When Vanessa is at her wits end she calls her friend over who happens to be the princessa of the Ujal and someone Erun must listen to. Once Tabitha is securely in her arms again she wants nothing more to do with Erun but that is not is to happen any time soon.Erun has had a very hard life his greatest accomplishment is becoming on of the royal guards. He believes that because of what has happened to him in his past he will never have a mate and he will never have any yearlings but the instant he sees Vanessa there is something about her. The first time he holds Tabitha he knows these two must be his even though he is sure he must fight this feeling. He is not sure this is something he can have or will be allowed by their council but the longing never stops if only he can convince Vanessa of their need to be together.This is an amazing story about love, finding a way to accept the past, healing. This story has many twist and turns and I can not wait to see where this author will take some of the other characters in future stories in this series. This book is part of a series but can be read as a stand alone. I would recommend this book to anyone and everyone.

This is a short book that has a taboo subject to it so if that is not for you stop now.This book is great for being so short it packs a punch. Troy is looking for a good time one night in a bar what he finds is Madge. Madge is different from his hit and run encounters he wants something more with her. What he isn't sure yet but knows this is more. When they get to her place she invites him in while the fun is getting going something catches his eye, her daughter. What happens next is one wild ride for all of the.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This book is not a stand alone and should be read in order with the other books.In this book we meet Chad and Gia. At the end of the second book we find out that Chad is indeed alive, not well though because he did in-fact get captured. In this book we are taken even farther down the rabbit hole where you really aren't sure who are the good guys and how are the bod ones. We really feel Chad's paranoia in this book he has been living with guilt and on the run for so long he doesn't know how to accept anything from anyone but the one he protects Amy. In this book we find out what really brought Amy to Denver and what role Chad has had in her life all these years. When Chad escapes with the help of Gia we find out what lengths he will go to ensure that those he loves are protected at all cost.Gia is holding secrets that she hasn't told anyone and if she can she never will. However to get information from Chad that is important to each of them she will have to give some and open up to him. In this book we find that Gia is a woman that can hold her own against Chad and those that are after her.The question for these two is when they learn each others secrets will it bring them together or drive them farther apart. This is an amazing book that will have these two on the run and if they are luck they will find some real allies in the process.I would recommend this book to anyone and everyone. It will have you hooked till the very end.

I received this book as an ARC for an honest review. This book is a stand alone and wow is it amazing.In this book we meet Christopher and Lyla. Christopher or X as he is called in prison has been for the last 10 years after killing his girlfriend Sarah and her friend Michael. Christopher pleaded guilty to the murder even with having no memory of the incident to help with the guilt he felt over loosing a woman he loved so much. As time goes on to survive in Fulton Rhodes Penitentiary Christopher had to die and someone stronger called X came to be. X makes no attachments and fights to survive in prison he figures this is his real punishment is to have no attachments and to fight almost everyday for the rest of his life. This is all X looks for day after day until one day day after being injured he sees the new nurse in the infirmary. Though he is very attracted to her he knows she is to green to be there and is sure that they will harm her or do other unthinkable things to her he is sure he has to get her to quit.Lyla takes one look at X on her first day of work and her world just stops. She isn't sure what it is about that man but he makes her heart skip and beat and her body flush with want. She knows nothing can happen between the two of them but when X rescues her one night from a rival prisoner she knows there is more than meets the eye with this prisoner. The more she talks to X the more she is sure that there is a chance that he might just be innocent of the crimes he is accused of.There are many more things that happen in this story that I really want to tell you about but as a reader I like to experience things for myself. This book is amazing and will have you hooked from the first word to the very end. I would highly recommend it.

I was sick and went to use my digital thermometer and the battery was dead . Was quick thinking and used my laser thermometer for heating , cooling and mechanical work then ordered these batteries . No expiration date but worked great . Have 9 extra for the price of buying 2 in town and having to spend $6 on gas to get them . Make sure you put them in the right way usually the lip goes down print up ...usually . Put the extra in the drawer and made sure I turned the thermometer off after using it . I sure miss the old mercury ones . Batteries are fine .

Some of the reviews were kind of sketchy saying they were thin , low quality , and shed allot . I found that was not the case . I usually buy Calcott which are very expensive unless on sale . Calcot towels are high quality and were full price when I needed a set while these were on sale . It was a great buy . They do fluff up and become softer overtime . While I did get some lint it was normal . Stitching and design band was very good quality . These are nice towels for everyday and the bath sheets are huge . For some they may be too large for everyday use and hard to towel off with . They may even take up too much room on a towel bar . However they are fine for me . The 30 by 54 inch bath size are nice too . I am very pleased with my purchase . These are nice for other uses also  I plan on using one bath sheet across the rear seat of my car and two smaller bath size on the front seats for protection plus to always have towels in my car that match the upolstry  if needed for drying it after a wash  , or the beach . I will be ordering more .

This is the best deal in Brake Controllers and the type of unit you want proportional not timed . It adjusts itself to up and downhills and proportionally to how hard your braking . The price was heavily discounted when I purchased so it was a no brainer . However the full price is not unreasonable . The only item this does not have is pocket mounting . In other words you have to mount it in with a bracket and screws . However it is only 4 or two to remove . Some have a bracket that mounts to the vehicle and you can just plug in and put the controller in the pocket mount . When you are not using the controller you unplug the back and pull it out storing it inside out of the heat or cold . You mount a pocket bracket on each tow vehicle you have thus needing only one unit for up to several tow vehicles . I will be ok as I primarily have one heavy tow vehicle though all my vehicles are set up to two any trailer I own . This was nice because Curt also makes plug in adapters for controller ready vehicles which my 94 Ford Van is . I just pluged in the pigtail into my wiring harness and then into the back of the controller . I had this installed in 10 minutes all one needs is a drill , a 1/8th inch drill bit and a phillips screw driver or 1/4 inch socket . With a nice new drill bit it took only 20 seconds to drill each screw hole for the mounting bracket . You mount the bracket to the controller then it has the dash or other area mounting holes on the outside of the bracket so you can drill it in place then place and tighten the screws . You just make sure where you are drilling there are no wires or items you could damage . It could not be easier . I am disabled and had it done and working in 15 minutes they do ask you disconnect the negative battery cable while installing . That takes a few minutes and a 3/8 wrench in my case and it is a good time to clean the terminals with a cable end cleaner which should be done yearly before winter . I have found Curt hitches and other products to be truly higher quality then other companies products including Reese and Draw Hitch both big players . I recommend Curt very highly . In my case if a car is prewired and can take the pigtail I mount the controller if it needs to be wired I have the dealer do it and it costs $250 here with the controller included in the cost . God Bless !

Purchased on sale so very pleased on price . Product is as advertised . Lasts well too but they suggest you touch up or reapply when you clean the inside a few times a year . Spills will bead up . Further other nasty's will not stick as easy and whipe up easier like chocolate , lipstick , the things that shouldn't but do come in contact with interiors . I suggest buying a few extra cans just store inside at room temp . I like to do the humps between mats . Did the two light coats with a day between and leaving the windows down in the garage overnight . Just as good as paying $250 for fabric protection at the dealer and the time to put it on is when the seats are new , clean and not stained . If you ever eat in your car then this is a must have ..period . You will be happy the first time you spill anything . Even works on the floor carpet but again you will seal in dirt so everything must be as clean as it can get before applying . Otherwise enjoy !

I am very pleased . I wrote already under comments while waiting for these . I have no worries about them lasting longer then the 2 year warranty . They are marked SUV truck mats . I put them in a 2000 Mercury Grand Marquis they fit the front perfect , and the back were too large going up the back rail . I prefer not to trim and just want to protect the carpet and am very pleased . Worth $10 more which I more then saved  on gas and time . Measurements are exact and they are 3/8 to 1/2 inch deep as one poster measured . Very good Mats I bought a can of 3 m car fabric protector and for $35 treated the front area and put mats down to protect my low mileage car and keep it like new . I treat the seats then put down towels to match across the rear and both buckets . Yes they move and I just straighten them out . These mats wont they fit tight in my vehicle . However they should be fine and worst case put a tac through down into the carpet fibers to hold in place . Unless these are too big for your car they are the ones you want if protection and keeping water off the inside is your desire . They are not ugly but also not the flashy pretty type either . You could not get better unless you spent $100 for weather tech laser cut for your specific car . Also a worthy choice . For my Grand Marquis I think these are as good . The weird pattern is so you can trim them easily for other vehicles .

I found these to be the best filter for my home . You do not want to restrict air flow and they do when getting dirty if left in for too long . I am do that accidently often so anything stronger would be a huge mistake for me . These have better flow then the 300 amazingly . They are stronger then other filters and slide into tight places better due to no criss crossing or wire mesh . Yes they cost a little more but I believe their worth it . I make sure I write on a index card mounted to the furnace when I change them . My mind is a mess becuase were often off . I try to change this every 3 months . You can hold them up to a light and if you cannot see through obviously its too dirty to use . I like buying these 6 packs on amazon you wont find a better price and with prime its here in two days or 4 over a weekend . I also have a humidifier that says change the filter yearly . I have learned to do it every 6 months . Water system too . My house requires allot of filters and you do get what you pay for . The electric static charge makes these worth a little extra .

This worked very good for me . You must add up both your draws and make sure your power supply is strong enough . I used these for a 60 degree IR Lamp that lights up everything to about 20 meters outside my home from inside . This lamp is under $20 here . However I wanted to be able to see further so I bought the 48 LED illumiator that is about $12 but has a tight spectrum it pushes out to about when paired with the 60 degree wide spectrum to about 100 feet or a little more with a narrower focus on the long end  but enough to light up something passing through to film or for me to see it which is what I need . IT is as good as a single 96  LED lamp that are used in parking lots that are narrow beam but get out 130 feet  and perfect for me . The reason being  is the 48 led round cameras take 2 inch 48 LED circuit board replacement parts easily found for $3 each so you can repair them easily because none of these lamps last like they claim . The other important point is if one dies your still illuminated where if you use one and it goes out your blind until you catch it . So it is worth $36 instead of $29 for a single 96 led lamp for all the parts to have 2 illuminators to get  96 leds with wide spectrum .  I would  say normal life is about 1.5 years for a IR lamp used daily  . The 196 lamp is $89 both these cost $38 with $4 for the splitter and will run on a quality 2 amp dc power supply . I have done it on the 1 amp but they get warmer so i use overkill especially when drapes are near . This works for me . I have only one window where I like the 300 ft lamp but otherwise am very happy with this set up and the splitter . Those 54 LED 60 degree IR lamps are perfect for indoor rooms . I use one in the garage . People just think their covered in darkness if they turn on the lights you see them better .
I am disabled they are intersting and work instead of tieing a shoe lace but do take 2 hands to use . Look ok .
Comfortable sweat type material . Not fancy but nice and thick . Good for fall and modest down to the knee like pictured . I am 6 1` 190 and they go down just below the knee on me .
Love them go below the knee on me just slightly . Look very sharp . I am 6 1 190 pounds . Perfect for the court not so much if you want sun but decent pockets and comfortable when hot out .

I still have so much more to learn but I love it. You find things you never will if you do not study and it is set up so you can quit and then start anywhere or where you left off each time . Installs right on the machine and you do not need the disc to use it after you have registered the product . I did have to put in a code key which is included . With windows 8 you have to have a microsoft account too just to set it up . I hadn't used mine since they had euchre online based on XP which was eliminated when they upgraded to Vista due to the expense of redoing everything . In fact games online have really never recovered from then we still keep a xp computer to play our old hasbro and other games written for it .

I have not used this bulb enough to give a real review but there was some information that needs to be given . First this will work with most Magnetic and Digital Ballasts . Second it will not appear very bright because it has red and orange spectrum's overbalanced to the white or daylight range because it promotes fruiting and flowering . I have tried this in my Iolite digital ballast because their bulbs keep cracking ..they do not last long but are also good while they do and a fraction of expensive bulbs some of which do not work with both ballasts . I do not understand it but all bulb makers will tell you these MH and MPS bulbs use more electric as they age so your better off changing them more often . They usually recommend every 2 years . These bulbs are about 1/3 the cost of the high end offerings so if they did burn out and they all do you will still come out ahead if yeilds are equal . On that be your own judge but I have found the incremental difference is not proportionately justifiable . Good luck may your gardens grow healthy organic produce that is State Fair quality .

I was not thrilled with this . The most important feature to me was range . I have Yard decorations that are about 60 ft from my back porch so I hoped this would reach if I went out in my PJ's and just stuck my hand out the door in winter and pressed the button to turn things off when high winds come through . Sadly I have to  go outside in the snow and it only reaches about 15 ft . Still better then having to pull plugs but not what was described . Also the design calls for mounting on a wall or stake above ground . Rain can short it out not acceptable for a outdoor component . I kept mine because at the price I paid it would of cost as much to send it back netting me zero for returning it . I have been using it . I had a couple of the SVAT remote switches in the past and they were fine just didn't last long about a year . I could get better range out of them and they never shorted out in rain just sitting on the lawn . I even used them inside with my old airconditioner that didnt have a temp switch on it . That one could handle the amps though I found a better switch with a plain thermostat in it later that was a better fit . . If you just have Christmas lights and can put this where you can walk up inside the house within 15 feet of it go ahead and buy this if it is cheaper . Otherwise I would order 2 SVAT  Remotes 1 to use and another for when it fails . They are handy . I use them for yard decorations and lights year around . They are handy when camping also . Wake up in the middle of the night just hit the key fob and turn on a string of lights hung around your screen patio and tent . You can a fob where everyone knows where it is too if your sharing a tent . Nice way to make a remote lamp in a garage too . Just plug a  hanging lamp into it and plug it into a outlet . When you need a light just reach in your pocket for the key fob and push the button . The SVAT ones had a few frequencies so you could have more then one when I purchased them . I think there were three but it was just dumb luck not to get a match . Drive way Patrols are the similar too though in some applications different frequencies are not necessary . Woods makes good products . I use their power chords and love their timer switch which I put on my electric bike chargers. This hsear

I use the woolite dry cleaning sheets to do my dry cleaning at home but still love to have washable dress pants . These are so nice with the expansion waste that is all self adjusting . The pants are lined down past the knee with a high quality lining . The pockets are shallow but the wallets have buttons . It has a button at the top of the zipper / fly . Hemming was spot on no issues and you do get a cuff . I have lost weight and it has been expensive this year as last years clothes won't fit . These were a affordable great new addition to Church and Work pants . Very pleased I love the material too for dress and with the lining it is fine year round . I highly recommend these affordable dress pants at the full price which I paid . If you can do better jump on them . 1 note I have been told not to iron them heat will damage the material .Tru to size order your regular size not smaller thinking they will expand and you will gain a inch and a little more  but not 2 .

Decent head lamp . I prefer the 135 and 200 lumen ones they make and keep one in all the vehicles as well as a go to spot on every floor should the power go out . We use them in place of flashlights too as well as for going for walks etc . I even use the 200 lumen for when i go on bike rides as a backup I carry in my pocket . My regular headlamp has a t-9 bulb and lithium batteries with a charger built in . There cheap now they used to be near $100 and they have been about $15 lately so I bought one for each bicycle . I always carry a spare though because I always forget to keep the batteries charged and there is nothing worse then being either stranded needing to work on something in the dark or having to peddle home on a bumpy road with potholes and no way to see them . The switch on this is a good one a push in not a slider . The sliders are junk they will turn on in your pocket and leave you with dead batteries . Never buy one with a slider switch . Some of the energizer headlamps have them and are junk . Now remember the stronger the lamp the less hours you get but these use AAA batteries easy to keep in your pocket and if you haven't already found out very affordable after the initial expense when you switch to rechargeable batteries . The  Panasonic Enuloops ( they bought out Sanyo ) will take 2100 charges and keep 70^ of their charge for 5 years in storage . You can't beat that . You can even put the AA's into adapters to work in D and C cell applications .

I have been looking for a new sock in black . One I could wear to the office or Church but comfortable unlike paper thin dress socks . I bought a pair of Thorlo's  Walking Crew socks that were very expensive 12 a pr and these 3 for 16 bucks . I wanted to see if there was a difference . They both are nice material and well made . I like the stitching on the Asics better but they advertise high padding / cushion and that just is not true . They are nice lightweight socks and will be my go to hot weather black pairs . For comfort and most of the year I will wear the much superior Thorlo walking crews in black . They were what I would call medium weight socks with very noticeable cushion / padding . They had a nice sheen and no wording or contrasting grey that shows over the top of your shoe just a little . These are not bad socks but I wanted a true cushion at the heel , toe and laces . I wanted something heavy enough for winter and these are just about as thin as a dress sock . Not quite but darn close . I bought x large and wear 12.5 or 13's and they were a good fit . Have a little room for shrinkage . Will update as I learn more about durability and shrinkage . They are nice material and feel above average . They look nice . They will work well when cool is more important then comfort . Of course then I might just as well wear the super thin dress socks . God Bless .

I have always bought my socks from Hanes , Walmart etc but no longer . They have a 30% off coupon for Christmas 30CLOTHING right now is the code . They come to 7.83 a pr for the XL which are perfect for my size 12.5 feet . I like the larger ones and my feet are not wide . They fit so nice . I love the feel of the material and extra padding . I was wearing dress socks in my Keens for Church and they were too thin . These are perfect so my shoes fit better . My feet are more comfortable and warmer and of course with the extra padding they last longer as I am guilty of always walking around the house in my socks wearing them out quick. I bought one pair first and was so pleased I bought another right away . I was a little worried but these are fine for Church or the Office as long as you have room in your shoes for the extra padding and their not that heavy .
