I would say medium weight so as long as your shoes are not tight in dress socks you will be fine . Very nice shine to the material I have only had them a short time so I will comment later on durability and shrinkage . I know I will be fine I order size XL which is mens 13 to 15 . I have a 12 and do wear a 13 in some footwear so I went with the larger size and they are perfect . I am 6ft 1 in 190 pounds also .These are very nice socks though very expensive .  God Bless .Here it is a little while longer . I want more but I just can't afford these at the regular price . I keep checking back to see if they have a sale like they did at Christmas so I can get a few more pair . After wearing these I find myself wanting to wear them everyday . I also learned a big lesson that the big box socks that are always size 8 to 12 are too small I need the 13 to 15 or XL size here . Keeping my fingers crossed they have a sale again like before so I can load up and buy a pair for every day of the week . No more cotton socks for me .

Warm lined and looks good . The ball on top only gives it more class and better looks then if it wasn't there . Great item to wear to the game in winter or to show team spirit . With how their playing quality  LIons items are in high demand. Comes with all the official tags and blessings of the NFL .

What a fantastic price for all the 46 plus minute episodes 111 of them with some extras . Michael Landon and Victor French both  outdid themselves with this series . Every show teaches life lessons and is suitable for all ages . The perfect show for family tv night . Do up a little popcorn or fruit and cheese slices and enjoy . Clean shows no worries though some may entertain subjects that are difficult for even adults to ponder though  they are suitable for all ages . Important values are taught through often heartwarming story plots based on Christian beliefs as you follow Angel Johnathon along his travels with his friend Marc . This is tv the way it was meant to be . Shows after the first year are edited for TV time slots but absolutely wonderful . Even non Christians should find the story plots enjoyable and heartwarming .

I am so glad I bought these on the lightening Deal  . They are exactly what I wanted and I have paid up to $45 before .If you take care of these they will last several years .  These were a little lighter weight then I thought from the description but that is fine I can put long underwear under them in winter and they will work in summer or year round . I wish the pockets had zippers but the description said they did not . They are decent though I will use a fanny pack for my wallet and keys after having them fall out before . Very sharp I would not feel out of sorts wearing these when running up to the store like regular sweats . Slim fit with plenty of stretch for big guys . I am 6 1 190 pounds and a XL was a very comfortable fit . I could of worn a L but now I have 20 pounds to give or so at Christmas . Happy Holidays everyone .

Great ending to this wonderful tale of two lovers.  DeVon and Krissy gave as good as they took and they gave the reader much to swoon about.  This was a wonderful series and I loved each book and especially how the author brought it all together.  If you enjoy some really hot and sexy romance then Krissy and DeVon are ones you will enjoy.  Highly recommend.

They finally came together and it was an explosion of sex and more sex.  Great second book in this series.  We learn more about Krissy and Devon and how things may not be as they seem.  Can't wait to read the third and final installment in this series to see how things get worked out.  Highly recommend.

Wow what a trip that story was.  Devon is such an ass and Krissy knows it but can't help but to be attracted to him.  Devon knows who and what he is and he doesn't care.  He finds he wants Krissy and will do whatever necessary to follow his attraction.  The author did a great job of bringing the characters to life and the storyline was entertaining and interesting to say the least.  I can't wait to read the next installment in their story.  Highly recommend.

It was good to get the history on Ty and Hailey.  Especially from the beginning.  The author did a great job of telling this part of their story.  I loved Ty's determination to win Hailey over and how Hailey finally gave in to all the things he made her feel.  Great job and can't wait to read their full length story.  Highly recommend.

Ian and Riley's story was fun and entertaining to say the least.  I enjoyed the way the author told their story and brought the characters to life.  It was an easy story to follow and get caught up in.  Both having trust issues that plays a part in their currant relationship.  Also the fact that Riley has a past to deal with makes the story that much better.  It is a great start to the series and I can't wait to read the next story in this series.  Highly recommend.
As described works perfectly

What a love story.  Ehd is alone and out hunting when he comes across Beh in one of the holes he has dug to catch large game.  He decides she will be his mate and help ease his loneliness.  Beh has other ideas and fights him every step of the way back to the cave.  Beh finally realizes Ehd isn't gonna hurt her and tries to talk to him but he doesn't understand her.  Will they be able to come together and mate despite their differences and will the love survive the harsh times in which they live?  The author does a good job of telling their story.  The storyline is entertaining and the characters are well developed and easy to connect with.  Highly recommend this beautiful love story.

Really good story of how love can grow if two people give up their secrets and open their hearts to all the possibilities.  Harper and Will had things to learn from each other but mostly about letting go.  That way they could accept what each has to offer.  The storyline was entertaining and the characters were well developed and easy to engage with.  Good start to the series.  Highly recommend.

Great story with a different spin on the vampire and paranormal.  Very interesting storyline and all the suspense and dangers to keep the reader engaged.  Jacken and Toni have a wonderful story and the author did a great job of telling it.  The characters are are so easy to like and follow.  Great start to this series.  Highly recommend.

Good story back in the 1800's.  The story gave the reader everything that was going on back in those days.  The author did a good job of telling Angie and Lance's story.  There's was one of hardship and trouble along the way to finding out if they could have their HEA.  Good start to the series.  Highly recommend.

Very enjoyable read.  Lindy is a young woman looking to change the way she has done things in life while looking for her mate.  She wants to be more respected and accepted within her pack.  So she sets out to make those changes and realizes her life is getting better for those changes.  Crimson is a Wulfen warrior in the fae realm and has been pushed by his mother to spell for his mate.  He has emptiness in his life he hopes will be filled once he finds his mate.  The spell takes him right to Lindy and she is caught up in a trap.  He rescues her and takes her to the fae realm so he can get her the help she needs.  This is the beginning of their journey to finding their HEA.  R. E. Butler does a great job of telling their story and bringing the characters to life.  It was interesting enough I read it in one sitting.  I enjoyed Lindy and Crimson and the dangers they faced while getting to know each other.  Overall a very enjoyable story.  Highly recommend.

Loved it.  What a exciting and entertaining story.  Kade and Sydney have always had a strong love but with the need to turn Sydney Kade didn't know what he was up against.  Sydney never wanted to become a vampire but with the demon causing so much damage to her body Kade had no choice.  Now she must learn to feed and live as a vampire something she never wanted to do.  Can they work through all that with the killer on the loose especially when he's after Sydney?  Kym Grosso did a great job with this book and bringing it to life.  The storyline was well written and very interesting to me.  I read it in one sitting it was that good.  Love this series and this book was a great addition to the series.  Can't wait for the next book.  Highly recommend.

I really enjoyed reading Vindicated.  It was a well written book with an interesting storyline.  The characters were easy to like and root for.  Karly came from a troubled past and was working two jobs trying to go to college so she could make her life better.  The only highlight in an otherwise tough life was her sister Emma.  Until she runs into a one night stand she had had six months past. Still noting the heavy attraction there for Randy they started a cat and mouse relationship.  Randy couldn't commit since he had been burned in a previous relationship.  He too had a troubled past and a dark present.  The author does a great job of telling their story and bringing things together.  They each had to work through some serious issues to find love.  I enjoyed the secondary characters and what was going on with them.  It just added so much more to the overall story.  Great book and great read.  I highly recommend this book.

What a great story about relationships.  Ginger had some serious baggage she was getting over and her past come back to haunt her some while she is trying to figure things out with Matt.  Matt was still getting over a divorce and trying to figure out it was he was feeling for Ginger.  Together they will have to get past their pasts to move on to a wonderful future together.  The author did a great job of telling their story and it was well written and the characters are as always so easy to connect with and enjoy.  I highly recommend this book and the whole series.

I absolutely loved Joker and Carissa's story.  How could you not fall in love with Joker?  He had his own story to tell with all the abuse he took from his father.  But through it all he grew into a dark brooding type that the brothers respected.  He happened upon Charissa to change her tire and it changed both their lives for the good.  I love this series and the author did a fantastic job of telling this story.  I highly recommend this book and this series.

What a wonderful story.  Jamie and Hallie had a rough start to things with Jamie keeping secrets from her.  But Hallie wouldn't give up on him.  The author did a great job of telling their story and bringing the characters to life.  It was fun and charming with all the craziness big families bring to the table.  I really enjoyed Jamie and Hallie's characters.  I loved how things came together for them.  Great story and highly recommend this book and series.

Really enjoyed this read.  Brooke is finishing up her degree and is friends with someone the DEA suspects is the son of a Mexican drug lord.  Even tho Brooke is innocent of what's going on around her the DEA agents follow her suspecting she has info that can help their case.  Kade is just doing his job when he finds himself attracted to Brooke.  Not necessarily good for his job.  Kade ends up too close to Brooke and she gets hurt.  The two will figure out they have an attraction for each other but the situation makes it difficult.  The author does a wonderful job of creating their story and bringing the characters to life.  I enjoyed the surprises along the way and how they worked together to see where their relationship could go.  Overall a very entertaining story.  I would highly recommend this book and series.

Love...love...love this series.  Getting Lucky was simply fantastic.  I loved Hope and everything about her.  With all her quirkiness it made her the perfect match for the all serious TJ.  Together they tore it up....lol.  The storyline was fun and entertaining and the characters are just so easy to connect with.  I love how they all make an appearance in this book and how the author carries them over to each new story.  Can't wait to see what's in store for the next book.  Great job and highly recommend.
Exactly as described

This was a very sensual sexy short story that gives us Bobbi and Mack.  They were high school sweethearts that were engaged but Bobbi walked away to further her career.  Both managed to go on with their lives and it wasn't until one long flight to London that they met up again.  Bobbi is the Captain of the 747 and was taking a break when she walked by and was very shocked to find Mack looking up at her.  Mack couldn't believe his eyes.  He hadn't seen Bobbi for over 40 years and here she was standing in front of him.  They find that fate has thrown them together again after all this time but both have secrets they aren't ready to share.  Will spending time together enable them to capture what they once had?  The story was very sexy and they were so easy to like and get to know.  The storyline was sexy and very entertaining.  It was enjoyable to watch them get to know each other.  The author did a good job with the storyline and it was well written.  It was a complete story that was easy to read and enjoy.  I would highly recommend this book.

Good box set about shifters.  The storyline in each book was interesting and entertaining enough to keep the readers attention.  The characters were easy to connect with and follow.  Overall a very good series.  Highly recommend.

What a great conclusion to this love triangle.  Liam and Natalie had a shock and then they had much to work through.  I don't want to give anything away so I will just say the author did a great job with the conclusion to this series and gives the reader a ride to which would come out on top in this love triangle.  The characters all carried over which made it easier to bond with them.  Very entertaining story.  Highly recommend.

Rough story full of all kinds of evil and danger.  Through all that danger is the beginning of a love story.  Hard to believe any love can be born out of evil.  Star is witness to murder and taken by a biker gang.  Remy is compelled to keep her safe and alive.  The author does a good job of telling their story.  Its full of a lot of emotion.  Can Star survive and can Remy save her?  Will have to read part two to see how their story continues.  It was a very dark kind of read and not something I think I'll be reading on to find out what happens.  Just too dark for me.  I'm more of a happy kind of reader.  But if you like that sort of thing it would be worth your time.

Very entertaining storyline.  Faelan has been in a time vault for 150 years when Bree finds the key to let him out and surprised to find herself with a highland warrior on her hands.  Together they go on a journey to fight evil and demons to save the world.  The author does a good job of telling their story.  The characters were easy to get to know and follow throughout the story.  Very entertaining.  Highly recommend.

This was a very enjoyable read.  Alyssa and Dillon had much to get through to reach their HEA.  The author did a great job of telling their story and bringing the characters to life.  This was a great start to the series.  Highly recommend.

This was a cute charming read.  Magenta has issues that she feels are too big and she has been hiding them all her life.  Harry was her best friend as kids and was super intelligent.  When he went away to college things changed for Magenta.  Now that Harry was back he wasn't taking no for an answer.  The author did a good job of telling their story and the characters were easy to connect with.  Was an entertaining story.  Highly recommend.

Very entertaining story and great addition to the series.  Eira is a very strong female who is a vampire and helps out the wolfs when they rescue others.  She has been around a long time and has been mourning the loss of her mate for many years.  Until she comes across Killian and can't believe he is her long lost love.  Killian has just been surviving and missing the one and only love of his long life.  They have each been fighting the war separately until they come in contact with each other once again.  The author does a great job of telling their story and also of keeping the story going from the series.  I have enjoyed the characters from all the books and love how most make an appearance in this book.  If you have read the first two this is a must read for you.  Highly recommend.

Great read....very interesting from the beginning.  The storyline the author created kept me engaged from the very start.  The characters were easy to connect with and get to know.  Sophie had to go back to a place she has run from and all for her son.  Once she gets there she realizes maybe things could have been different.  Dylan was just thankful to have his wife and son home even tho they had a pending war coming.  Overall very entertaining.  Highly recommend.

What a steamy sexy dangerous read.  I loved how two completely different people came together amongst the danger to find their slice happiness.  Garrett is forever chasing the adrenaline rush and Shelby is looking to stay safe and sound.  Murder brings a twist to this story and keeps the reader engaged from the beginning.  Great start to a new series.  Can't wait to read Lars story.  Highly recommend.

What a cute funny entertaining read.  Arik is the king of the lions and comes to meet Kira in the barbershop where he goes to get is luscious mane trimmed.  But when his usual barber is unavailable he finally agrees to let Kira cut his hair.  When he says something that upsets her she cuts a hunk of his luscious hair off.  Of course he is upset and Kira decides her best option is to run.  This is the beginning of their fun with a twist of serious relationship.  The author does a great job of keeping the reader entertained with the funny dialogue that transpires between Kira and Arik throughout the story.  I absolutely enjoyed this read.  Highly recommend.

Very entertaining story about finding ones mate and dealing with the evils one's own family can cast upon another.  Rue and Dom have been on the run most of her life.  Running from her own family after being outcast for being albino.  Aside from that she was also not supposed to ever have children and ends up pregnant with Dom.  She has always done everything to protect him from her family.  When she finds out about a clan party she wanted just to get close enough to see everyone one last time.  She could no way prepare for what was to come.  Not only does she meet her mates John and James but her family finds her and Dom and she fears for their lives.  The author does a great job of bringing it all together.  The characters are well developed and the storyline is interesting from the beginning.  I read it in one sitting since I couldn't wait to find out if they all got their HEA.  I was given this book to read for an honest review.  I can honestly say it was very enjoyalbe and would highly recommend it to other readers.  Great job R. E. Butler.

This was a very enjoyable short story about finding love again after nine long years of being seperated.  Julia was a successful businesswoman who was in charge of helping the new chief of police find a place to live.  What she didn't know was that it was her highschool sweetheart that broke her heart nine years previously that she was supposed to help.  The author did a great job of telling their story and bringing Adam and Julia together again after so long apart.  But their road was not as easy on as Julia had a stalker that was causing havoc in her life.  Even tho this was a short story it was packed full of goodness for the reader to enjoy and the characters were easy to connect with and enjoy.  This was given to me to read for an honest review.  I can honestly say it was a very enjoyable story of romance and mystery with a touch of danger.  Highly recommend.

What an entertaining story.  The main characters were easy to connect with and the storyline was interesting from the start.  Sky is being stalked by a crazy person who is killing women who look like her.  She comes back from a job to find Wyatt the local alpha taking over and telling her what she needs to do and not do.  They both realize they are mates but neither want to follow through with mating.  Wyatt wants to help Sky out and keep her safe until they can catch this stalker.  Sky just wants to go home but its not possible since its a crime scene.  The more time they spend together the more they feel the mating pull.  But will they give in and make it official all the while trying to save Sky from the stalker that keeps things crazy for her.  The author did a great job of telling their story.  I enjoyed watching them come together and figure out how two strong personalities can work together to solve a crime and mate.  It is the start to what looks to be an enjoyable series.  Highly recommend.

This was an entertaining story of evil and good.  The characters were interesting and easy to connect with.  It had a touch of danger mixed with some sexy romance.  The story is well written and easy to enjoy.  Highly recommend.

This was a very short little read about two guys that had been circling around each other finally getting together and realizing how they feel about each other.  It seemed rushed at times and was just too short for my enjoyment.  There just seemed to be so much more that could have been told about their relationship.  What there was to it was ok and somewhat enjoyable to read.

Nice little start to what seems to be an unexpected romance in the jungle.  Clara and Grant meet while traveling and end up with the same destination which was totally unexpected but in a good way.  After sharing a night of passion they find themselves going on the same journey except for maybe different reasons they end up in a village to volunteer their time to help children.  The story ends with them enjoying their first night there.  It was a well written short little start to this series.  If you enjoy an unexpected romance then you will enjoy the beginning of Clara and Grant's story.  Highly recommend.

Tor and Christina had much to overcome in their relationship to gain their HEA.  The author did a good job of telling their story.  The characters were well developed and easy to connect with.  Good start to this series. Highly recommend

Wow. What a story.  Talk about a screwed up man.  Aidan has some serious issues of which we learn a bit about as the story is told.  Lily is doing this to help keep her dad out of prison due to health issues.  I just wish we would have known a little more about Aidan and what made him the way he is.  We get bits of his story but not enough to totally understand where he is coming from.  Lily I get its her need to help family that puts her in this situation.  As Lily gives herself over to Aidan and his needs she is finding it harder to keep her feelings out of it.  Aidan feels for her more than he has ever allowed himself to feel and he is not liking what she makes him feel.  Not sure if the story was enough to make me want to read the next book in this series or not.  Just didn't do that much for me.  The sex scenes were good but its all its based on.  Again just didn't learn enough about Aidan and what makes him the way he is to make it interesting enough for me.

Great highlander story.  Cavan and Honora had to go through a lot to reach their HEA.  The author did a great job of telling their story and bringing the characters to life.  A really good start to this series.  Highly recommend.

Loved Puck and Becca's story.  I'm always up for a good MC story and this one had it all. It was sexy with a touch of danger plus getting the HEA most of us as readers want to see.  The author did a great job with this storyline and characters.  It was easy to follow and get to know the characters.  Can't wait to read the next book in this series since this was a great start to the series.  Highly recommend this and mostly anything this author writes.

Nick and Willow had a very entertaining story.  I enjoyed the journey they each had to take to get to their HEA.  The author did a good job of telling the story and the characters were easy to connect with.  Highly recommend
Loved the movie.  I enjoyed the books and was worried that they wouldn't get the movie right.  But they did a great job of bringing it to life on the big screen.

What a story.  So full of emotion with a bit of humor.  Lila and David come together with a bit of humor and end up leaning on each other after they try and work through all the emotional turmoil they are both going through.  The author does a great job of telling their story.  We get to learn what it is that Lila and David have issues with and how it affects their relationship.  The storyline has some danger that they have to face as well as all the emotions they have to work through.  I really enjoyed how they managed to work things out to reach their HEA.  All the characters were well developed and easy to follow.  Was just a good heartwarming feel good story and I highly recommend it.

I enjoyed reading The Omega's Heart by R. E. Butler.  Jeremiah is a man/wolf that comes with his own set of problems.  Mostly the fact he has never been able to shift to a complete wolf and feels less of a man/wolf because of that one DNA flaw.  Honey is running from her family problems and just wants to start over somewhere safe.  She takes refuge with Jeremiah's pack and agreed to move on after the full moon.  That is until she comes in contact with Jeremiah and realizes he is her mate.  Together they overcome the baggage they both have to find the love that mates have for each other.  But it doesn't come without a bit of danger.  The author did a great job telling their story and bringing it all together for the reader to get the HEA needed.  The characters were easy to connect with and follow.  Overall it was a very entertaining story and one I would highly recommend to readers who enjoy a good shifter story.

Loved this story about Tucker and Delaney.  Delaney brings herself and four boys to spend the summer with Tucker to help them heal and finds more than she bargained for.  Tucker knows the moment he meets her that he wants her especially after hearing about her for years.  Now he just needs to convince her it's what she wants too.  The author does a wonderful job of telling their story.  The characters are easy to fall in love with and to be able to feel their story.  This has been an enjoyable series and I highly recommend this book.

Another good feel good story.  Zane needs to find a bride and thinks he has the perfect solution.  What he doesn't expect is to find himself falling in love with Storm but she's not who he thinks she is.  Will they get it all figured out to meet his Aunts demands?  The author does a good job with their story. I also enjoy how most of the characters carry through each new story.  Been a very enjoyable series.  Highly recommend.

I really enjoyed Austin and Ella's story.  Austin dealing with things left over from his time in the service and Ella running from her past. Together they were able to come together to work things out to find their HEA.  The author did a great job of telling their story and the characters were easy to get to know.  Great series and highly recommend.

Loved it.  Mason is the strong soldier with a timeline to find a bride and start a family.  Ragen answered an ad while having a bit to drink and thinking it's more of a joke than anything else.  She didn't expect to be wowed by Mason and Mason didn't expect to find someone so soon that he was attracted to.  The author did a great job of telling their story and giving the characters life.  The storyline was interesting and fun to read.  Great series.  Highly recommend.

I loved Niall and all his baggage from his previous marriage and divorce.  He is so scared of letting go and enjoying what Ruby has to offer him.  Together they figure it out but not without a few mistakes along the way.  The author did a great job of telling their story and bringing the characters to life.  I have enjoyed this series and this book did not disappoint.  Highly recommend.

Loved the story of Seth and Presley.  Seth vows to keep her safe and ends up attracted to her too.  The author did a great job of telling their story.  The characters are well developed and easy to connect with.  Great start to this series.

Great story. Gwen and Neil were meant for each other but needed to get through the danger to find their HEA.  I have enjoyed this series they are all fun and funny with a twist of something they each must go through to find what they are looking for.  Highly recommend.

I enjoyed the story of Francesca and Ian.  He has his dark demons and was faced with her innocence.  But she took to his world which surprised him.  The author did a good job of telling their story.  I read it in one sitting cause I had to find out if they found their HEA.  Highly recommend

This was an enjoyable story of paranormal shifter love and dangers.  Tao was saved by Aubrey and in turn he swore to save her from his crazed brother and help her with her first shift.  The author did a good job of telling their story.  It was interesting and entertaining.  Good start to the series. Highly recommend

Jackson and Sylvia's story was interesting and entertaining.  Sylvia has past demons chasing her and Jackson is looking for a little revenge.  But will they each end up getting what they want or need in the face of spilling secrets of their past?  The author did a good job of telling their story.  The characters are easy to connect with.  Good start to this trilogy.  Highly recommend

Loved Naya and Wheeler's story.  We get to learn what made Wheeler who he is plus he gets a mate.  The author did a great job of telling their story and keeping the storyline interesting from the beginning.  This has been an enjoyable series and Three Hours did not disappoint.  Highly recommend.

Carter and Eliza had a very enjoyable story.  Eliza comes with a secret history that Carter is trying to protect her from her past.  Will their marriage last and will they overcome the obstacles faced to find their HEA.  Enjoyable series and highly recommend

Blake and Sam had a sweet and charming romance even if it did start out unconventional.  This was a good read with an enjoyable storyline. The characters were easy to get to know and like.  The author did a good job of telling this sweet romantic story. Good start to the series.  Highly recommend

Enjoyable read.  Tristen and Nina had many obstacles to overcome to reach their HEA.  The author did a very good job of telling their story.  The characters are well developed and the secondary characters play an important role in the story.  It was great to have all three stories in a box set.  Very enjoyable read and highly recommend.

Loved it.  This book takes us through a dark time for all three of them.  It also answers a lot of questions that needed answered.  I love Soren...Nora and Kingsley.  Tiffany Reisz takes the reader on a dark journey of self discovery to bring them to the happiness they have all finally found in life.  This series is one of the best I've read and I read a lot. Can't say enough good about all the books in the series. Highly recommend.

What a great read. Cyn and Raphael entertains the reader with another great story in this series.  I love how they rely on each other and together they're sexy as heck.  Raphael must do what he must for the safety of his vampires and Cyn must do what she does for the safety of Raphael.  The author does a great job of keeping the reader engaged in the story from the beginning to the end.  If you enjoy a good read with a kick ass heroine and a sexy strong alpha vampire then this is the series for you.  Highly recommend

7:46 Mins The Boruit RJ-5000 is one heck of a headlamp.  It shouldn't even be called a headlamp, more like a head flashlight because that is what it feels like.  I do want to disclose that I was provided a sample for review purposes.  Take what you will but this is a solid little headlamp that has the power of a flashlight on your head.Amazon limits videos to 100 megs, so I have left a comment with a link to the high resolution version of this video.Ok, so let me get right into it.  This headlamp is heavy, 14.4 ounces to be exact.  At first, that was a huge turnoff for me, I will have to admit.  It was big, bulky and heavy.  Not exactly friendly words to the hiker, backpacker or weekend warrior.  It is huge and heavy but you know what, it is also incredibly ergonomic.  I quickly got used to the large plastic mold in the front and the ever so slightly curved battery pack in the rear.  After walking around with it for a few minutes I got used to the weight and thought this isn't so bad after all.  The weight is pretty nicely distributed throughout as well and with a 3 band design you can be assured that this headlamp is fully adjustable and will not easily fall off your head if you set the bands to the correct lengths and tensions.Next came me using it.  I was blown away by how bright it was.  I did not like the large center light because it had a large hotspot right in the middle.  However, the side flood lights were awesome.  Due to their positioning and optics, they did not produce a hotspot and actually did a great job of providing a nice wide illumination area with no hot spots.  Then I tried all three and that was pretty bright, almost too bright, until I went outside in total dark.  That is where this light really shines.  It beats every other headlamp I have ever had or seen.  It actually takes a little getting used to but if you can bear with it for a little time hopefully it will become your preferred headlamp as well.  I quickly found myself using the two side floods and walking around my backyard with no problems whatsoever.  I took this lamp camping with me and that is where the three lights all on at the same time was useful.  I also used the three lamps on when I helped my boss put in a recessed can in his attic.  His attic had no lighting and I had no problems with seeing up there.You get (2) 4000 mAh Boruit Lithium ion batteries, which can hold a lot of juice, are rechargeable and you can easily find extras on Amazon.  You get two chargers, a USB one with a smiley face and an AC one.  They work fine and I like how the company gives you the USB one.  I would expect the AC charger, which is faster but the USB charger is really nice.  You could pair this with a USB battery charger on your trip or charge it from your car.  It just opens up a whole lot of options for ease of convenience in recharging.The one thing I did not like about this light, in addition to the center hot spot and the weight (which they can't really do anything about) is the way they chose to seal the battery compartment.  It is just a fitted rubber cap with a little connector so if it comes loose it won't fall off.  I would like to see a flathead screw that your could turn with your hand to a sealed, gasketed compartment.  Let's face it, people go camping, get a little crazy, leave these things laying out and they eventually get rained on or soaked a little.  A little water to the battery compartment would corrode the batteries and rust the contacts.  Just be careful with this and you should be fine.I did also want to mention the nicely tensioned fully adjustable positioning of this headlamp.  Sometimes you want straight down and sometimes you want tilted up - well you can easily do both with this lamp.I have gotten more and more used to this headlamp over time and it is now my go to headlamp for late night grilling, trash night, picking up toys in the yard or doing odd jobs around the house.  If you can get the straps positioned and tensioned correctly, are ok with the weight, then you will eventually fall in love with this headlamp because it truly is like having a bright flashlight on your head.

7:46 MinsThe Boruit RJ-5000 is one heck of a headlamp.  It shouldn't even be called a headlamp, more like a head flashlight because that is what it feels like.  I do want to disclose that I was provided a sample for review purposes.  Take what you will but this is a solid little headlamp that has the power of a flashlight on your head.Amazon limits videos to 100 megs, so I have left a comment with a link to the high resolution version of this video.Ok, so let me get right into it.  This headlamp is heavy, 14.4 ounces to be exact.  At first, that was a huge turnoff for me, I will have to admit.  It was big, bulky and heavy.  Not exactly friendly words to the hiker, backpacker or weekend warrior.  It is huge and heavy but you know what, it is also incredibly ergonomic.  I quickly got used to the large plastic mold in the front and the ever so slightly curved battery pack in the rear.  After walking around with it for a few minutes I got used to the weight and thought this isn't so bad after all.  The weight is pretty nicely distributed throughout as well and with a 3 band design you can be assured that this headlamp is fully adjustable and will not easily fall off your head if you set the bands to the correct lengths and tensions.Next came me using it.  I was blown away by how bright it was.  I did not like the large center light because it had a large hotspot right in the middle.  However, the side flood lights were awesome.  Due to their positioning and optics, they did not produce a hotspot and actually did a great job of providing a nice wide illumination area with no hot spots.  Then I tried all three and that was pretty bright, almost too bright, until I went outside in total dark.  That is where this light really shines.  It beats every other headlamp I have ever had or seen.  It actually takes a little getting used to but if you can bear with it for a little time hopefully it will become your preferred headlamp as well.  I quickly found myself using the two side floods and walking around my backyard with no problems whatsoever.  I took this lamp camping with me and that is where the three lights all on at the same time was useful.  I also used the three lamps on when I helped my boss put in a recessed can in his attic.  His attic had no lighting and I had no problems with seeing up there.You get (2) 4000 mAh Boruit Lithium ion batteries, which can hold a lot of juice, are rechargeable and you can easily find extras on Amazon.  You get two chargers, a USB one with a smiley face and an AC one.  They work fine and I like how the company gives you the USB one.  I would expect the AC charger, which is faster but the USB charger is really nice.  You could pair this with a USB battery charger on your trip or charge it from your car.  It just opens up a whole lot of options for ease of convenience in recharging.The one thing I did not like about this light, in addition to the center hot spot and the weight (which they can't really do anything about) is the way they chose to seal the battery compartment.  It is just a fitted rubber cap with a little connector so if it comes loose it won't fall off.  I would like to see a flathead screw that your could turn with your hand to a sealed, gasketed compartment.  Let's face it, people go camping, get a little crazy, leave these things laying out and they eventually get rained on or soaked a little.  A little water to the battery compartment would corrode the batteries and rust the contacts.  Just be careful with this and you should be fine.I did also want to mention the nicely tensioned fully adjustable positioning of this headlamp.  Sometimes you want straight down and sometimes you want tilted up - well you can easily do both with this lamp.I have gotten more and more used to this headlamp over time and it is now my go to headlamp for late night grilling, trash night, picking up toys in the yard or doing odd jobs around the house.  If you can get the straps positioned and tensioned correctly, are ok with the weight, then you will eventually fall in love with this headlamp because it truly is like having a bright flashlight on your head.

9:53 Mins Feilun has hit a home run with the FT009 RC Racing Boat.  I have been watching some other videos that users have posted but I don't think they really capture how fast this little boat really is or how much fun it can be.  It goes about 15 mph on a full charge for a few minutes.I do want to state that I was provided a sample for review purposes but my thoughts and comments are my own, so take from this what you will.  Also, Amazon limits reviews to 100 megs, so I will leave a link to my high resolution video in the comments section.Feilun has done a lot of things about this boat right and not a lot wrong.  Let me start with the boat itself.  It comes with a powerful water cooled motor which does a great job of keeping the motor cool.  The boat also has a great watertight seal which is crucial to keeping this boat functioning and working properly.  I reviewed another small RC racing boat and on two runs it got water inside the hull both times.  That will kill a RC boat, so the fact that I had this boat upside down and drove it under water in reverse and water did not get in is a testament to how well this boat was designed and engineered.  The 1500 mAh Li-Po battery will last 10 - 15 minutes depending on how hard you run this boat and how many breaks you give it.  I found that if I took the little breaks that when I did gun it again it would really go full throttle just like the battery was new.  If you look online, you can find replacement parts pretty easily as well as a bunch of pretty solid reviews for this boat.  This is another advantage of buying a hobby grade level product instead of a toy that you just throw away once it breaks.  This is hobby grade but entry level as there are other RC boats out there which are a lot more expensive and go a lot faster (like 60+ mph fast).I do wish it came with a second battery.  This way you could take both batteries with you to the water.  The water cooled engine does a great job at keeping the motor cool and if you gave it a 10 minute break in between runs you wouldn't burn up the electronic speed controller and receiver.  I also noticed that this boat would make nice, sharp right turns but make less sharp left turns.  I found this out while I was making figure 8's in the water.  I wonder why this is as sharp left and right turns would really be a lot more fun.  I suggest the manufacturer look at this and their rudder servo to see if they can find a way to make this boat carve it out a little better.  The transmitter is nice, nothing fancy but gets the job done.  It does require 6 AA batteries so be prepared to provide that upon receiving this boat.  Would be nice if they came with the boat but this is pretty typical, especially when 6 batteries are involved.  I would also like to see the transmitter beep when the boat gets close to being out of range and when the battery on the boat is nearing low voltage cutoff (LVC).  Basically, this would prevent you from having your boat stuck out in the middle of the lake when your battery dies.  You should be able to avoid this with good common sense, your boat will slow when it is running out of juice.  Also, it does have a pretty good range on the 2.4 GHz transmitter, I think the manual mentioned 300m but you should never have the boat anywhere close to that far away from you.  Again, these are just suggestions to make a better product - not really negatives as common sense plays into operating this boat.This boat has a rudder servo which controls the rudder.  The servo gives the user proportional left and proportional right, so the harder you turn the controller the harder the boat turns, same with the throttle.One feature which this boat has which is key is the self-righting capability after capsizing.  If you quickly flip the boat from full reverse to full throttle and then back to full reverse and full throttle if you catch the timing just right the boat will flip itself over.  This is a key, key, key feature and should not be overlooked when deciding what RC boat to choose.These are my thoughts on this boat.  I like it a lot and I am not just saying that because I got a free sample.  It is a very solid little boat and I encourage you to research it and you will see what I am talking about.  They also make a smaller version of this boat, the FT007 and a brushless version the FT012.  You can also pick up an extra battery for about $12.  The boat also comes with nose guards which are a good idea and I think the graphics are pretty sleek and sharp.  This boat does a lot right and very little wrong but has some room for improvement.  If you are looking for an entry level RC racing boat, don't really want to spend a lot of money, want something that will work and that you can find replacement parts for pretty easily, this is going to be a good choice for you to get started in the hobby.

5:19 MinsThe PowerCore+ mini is an upgrade to Anker's hugely successful 2nd Gen Astro mini.  They kept all of the things that people liked about the battery charger and have added a few new features.  The biggest change that one will see is that the on-off button is now gone.  There was a clear plastic label over the end of the charger that tells the user to press in to turn on the unit.  The power button is now an LED indicator light letting the user know how much charge is now left in the battery.  The LED indicates red, yellow or green - pretty simple and intuitive.  The other change is that they have improved the efficiency of the battery.They kept the size and capacity the same.  I was able to charge my iPhone 6 from 40% to 79% in 40 minutes.  It is only a 1A power charger, not the full 2.4 A but I guess this is the best they can do at this size now.Anker also kept PowerIQ technology which detects what type of device is connected and optimizes charging speed up to 1 A.I have tested several battery chargers and Anker's are among the best out there if not the best.  If you won't take my word for it, just look at the other reviewers out there.  I am a little curious as to why thy chose to first release this charger in pink instead of black, but the manufacturer tells me that other colors will be released at the end of June 2015.At 3350 mAh, with a nice aluminum case, LED functionality - this charger provides the perfect blend of power, capacity, style and functionality to make it an ideal portable charger for a lot of folks.I was provided a sample for review purposes but this is a great charger and I have no problems recommending it.  If you need a larger charger, search through Anker's product listing as they make several sizes and capacities for whatever you might need.

9:39 MinsHoly Stone's F181 quadcopter is a great entry level quadcopter for folks just getting into the hobby of flying drones.  I got bitten by the bug a couple of months ago, so I am still learning the ropes but this is a good one to start on if you are considering getting into the hobby.I also want to let everyone know that I received a sample from the manufacturer for evaluation and review purposes.  I try to be as candid as I can in my reviews and will let everyone know what I did and did not like about the quadcopter.  Amazon limits videos to 10 minutes and 100 megs, so I will leave a comment with a link to watch my video in high resolution.Quadcopters are addicting because they are very easy to fly.  I have always wanted to fly planes, helis but I didn't have a big field, a ton of money or any experience.  Enter 2015 and the boom of quadcopters on the hobby market.  These toys are durable, easy to fly and even come with cameras to take videos and pictures of your flights.  I taught myself to fly quadcopters over a weekend and you can too.Onto the F181, here is a quick summary of the PROs and CONs about this quad.PROs-Durable, suggest installing propguards until you get comfortable with flying the quad-Easy to fly, not too fast, variable pitch angles allow user to grow with the quad-Camera takes pictures and video, needs to have no wind and be in a good hover for a nice camera shot or video.  Camera has an adjustable angle so you can tailor the view that you are recording.  Comes with a 2 gig TF card, which is nice to be provided with the quad-2.4 GHz, this quad has a pretty good range but be careful of getting it up too high in the wind.  Two things will kill this quad, flying it above trees and flying it in wind.  Please use common sense when learning to fly this quad, your neighbors don't want it stuck in their tree and it is a lot windier above the trees than down on the ground, and if you are not careful the wind will catch this quad and take it away and out of range.-Trims with memory, trim out this quad indoors to make sure it isn't flying left or forward and then the transmitter will save these settings.  This is a key feature of this quad because it is super annoying to have to trim out a quad each time you fly it.  Some of this quad's competitors do not have this feature.-Comes with (2) large 750 mAH Li-Po batteries.  These give a flight time of around 5-7 minutes.  Very important is to give this quad a 10 minute rest between flights.  Failure to do so could overheat the electronics or prematurely burn out the brushed motors.  The temptation is to just swap out batteries but you need to be patient if you want this quad to last.-Flips, this quad comes with autobatics.  You can flip in any direction, just make sure you have enough elevation to allow you ample room for recovery.-Battery cover and an ON-OFF switch.  Nice for not having the battery fall out and the on and off switch is just convenient-Nice LEDs, let you fly at night, maintain orientation, blink when it is time to bring the quad in for a landing-Excellent customer support.  As I mentioned above that I received a sample for review purposes, the manufacturer really bent over backwards for me.  He sent me one quad and a motor burned out.  This was most likely my fault for taking it on a baseball field and getting all the baseball field dust in the motors.  Then he sent me a replacement unit but this got lost by Lasership.  He then sent me a third unit and this is the unit I ended up doing the review on.  The manufacturer even puts his e-mail on the packaging in several places.  He is responsive when you e-mail him and he wants you to enjoy this product or help you if you have any problems.  These folks get it.-25%, 50%, 75%, 100% pitch adjustments.  Lets you control how fast you fly and how much control you can exert over the quad.  Conveniently placed on the left bumper button for easy access.CONs-It is durable but you still have to be careful.  Always move the throttle down before crashing.  Even a soft crash in the grass can burn a motor out if you don't throttle down as the motor will want to continue to spin when the prop can't move in the grass.  Always inspect the craft prior to reflying, make sure no grass or debris is twisted around a blade.  Also keep this quad away from water, heavy moisture and dust and dirt - they will get in the motors and cause them to prematurely burn out.  Just use common sense where you fly this and how you fly this and you should get a lot of life from the quad.-Could recover better on flips.  Like I said before, you need to put some elevation under your quad to give it time to recover from the flips.  Also, you need to be careful when going from a full throttle to no throttle in the air.  The quad will drop and if it is nearing the end of the battery won't be able to recover.  This could be the death of your quad if you get it over a tree and high up and try to lay off the throttle and bring it back down.  It won't have enough juice to catch the quad and let you redirect it away from the tree.  If you do get it caught in a tree, I suggest a fishing rod and some treble hooked fishing lures - time for some tree fishing.-Battery charger - be very, very careful with this.  Mine melted but it was because I hooked them up to a high-current USB charger.  I see the manufacturer has added a warning about this in the description.  Heed this warning.  They included chargers are only intended to be used on a computer and will take a long time to charge up the Li-Po batteries.  I suggest you get a high current charger, I will include a comment which links to this product.  I suggest the manufacturer include this charger with future updates to the product so the user will get better performance and also so the user will be safer.  You also need to educate and learn about Li-Po batteries, they are great batteries but at the same time you need to be very careful around them and never leave them charging unattended.-Camera - The video is 720P but if it is windy can be choppy and have a jello effect.  Camera shots are decent in no wind and with a good hover.  The quality is what you would expect for a product at this price point.  If you want quality video, you will spend hundreds to get high quality aerial photography.  Just be aware of this...that's all I am saying.  The camera is a nice add-on but you should not be buying this quad if that is all you are interested in.-I did have to replace some motors on this quad and it is quite a lengthy process to get to the board.  I suggest fewer screws and using motors that come with connectors that pop in and out so it is much easier to get to and change one of the motors.  You will eventually burn out a motor or a prop will stop spinning as it should.  You will need a $10 soldering iron.  You unscrew everything, order some new replacement motors, keep track of the orientation of everything and it is pretty easy.  You heat up the soldering iron, pull out the old wires and then heat up the solder and place in the new wires.  It is only two wires but it is a process to get to.  I got four new motors for $18 from Amazon, just make sure they are listed to work with the F181 and you will be ok.  You also need to replace red and blue and black and white motors with the like kind.  It is simple to do, just takes some time and I think it is a worthy investment in order to keep this quad up and running.  Eventually you will need to do this, so just be aware of it.  You will need to do this on every quad you fly, some are just easier to disassemble and some have places where the motors just snap in and snap out.This is a great quad for beginners to learn on.  It also has a headless mode which keeps your orientation regardless of the way the keys are pressed but I did not test out this feature.  There are some cons but mostly pros.  Probably the most important thing I can tell someone looking to get into this hobby is to use common sense.  Do not fly this above trees, do not fly it high, do not fly it on windy days, do not try to fly it really far away from you.  Just keep it safe and simple when learning.  Go to a wide open area and keep it in close range.  In short, never put the quad in a place where you can't get to it and always throttle down for those crashes.  It is very, very tempting to get this quad up high in a residential area but it is super easy to have the wind take it (it is much greater above the trees and homes than you think) or to have it come down or get stuck 50' up in a tree.  I cannot emphasize this enough...the camera footage is cool but you will never know because you have lost your quad.  Take my advice, it isn't worth losing your quad over, the footage isn't that great.

9:49 MinsI was provided a sample for review purposes but my opinions are my own.  Amazon limits video reviews to 100 megs, so I will include a link to my higher resolution video review in the comments section.  Also, this review is for the Tempo boat but the Venom is just a different color.UDI RC's Tempo/Venom boat is a ton of fun.This boat is awesome and I like lots and lots of things about it.  Let me start with the boat itself.  The hull is very, very fast and it can go up to 15 mph in the water no problem.  I did get some water in the boat on my first two runs but did not get any in on my next two runs.  You need to really make sure you have sealed the top down into the grooves and have pressed it down and have sealed it as tight as you possibly can.The boat is very stable in the water and I tried to flip it but could not.  However, should you flip it in the water, have no fear as this boat has an automatic flipping feature.  That is by far the best feature of this boat as it means that you can run it virtually on any water surface and not have to worry if it accidentally gets flipped over.The rudder is nice and big and the servo that controls it is nice and smooth.  Servo based control means that a little left is a little left and a lot of left is a lot of left.  It is proportional to how much you turn the steering wheel which is a great thing.I found the transmitter which requires 4 AA batteries very easy to use.  When you put the boat in the water, I suggest you just go straight out first and adjust the trim settings so the boat travels as straight as possible - this will help you for the whole time you run the boat.  I did not receive two boats so I cannot comment on if two boats can be synced up at the same time but the manufacturer states that you can do this I think with up to three boats.  2.4 GHz transmission is hobby grade and I had no range issues at all with this boat.  Apparently when the battery gets weak the transmitter will start to beep, so this is a good safety feature that the manufacturer has built in.The batteries are robust and you get about 6-8 minutes of runtime with each battery pack.  You can tell when the batteries are getting close to dying because the boat slows down considerably.  Do not let the batteries run all the way down, they are lithium ion and this will really damage them if you continually fully drain them.A note of caution, supposedly the prop will stop turning when the boat is out of water.  I noticed that it still turned occasionally when it was out of the water - so just be careful.  Your best bet is to turn off the transmitter and then remove the boat from the water so you don't have an accident.Last but not least, this boat is not built for saltwater, so don't take it to the ocean or it will quickly get ruined.  One last tip that I want to pass on is to make sure you are comfortable getting into the water you drive your boat on or that you can access it with a boat.  I caught mine in some weeds about 10' away from the bank of the river and luckily the boat had enough steam to motor on in.  However, had this been far out I would have had to go swimming, get a boat or be prepared to say bye-bye.

5:28 MinsFinally someone has done it.  Welcome to 2015, where Mpow has finally solved the age old riddle of how to put out an economical set of Bluetooth headphones that not only sound great but stay in your ears.  You hear that, that is the sound of my silent applause for Mpow's team of dedicated professionals.Let me also get this out of the way.  I was provided a sample for review purposes by Mpow.  I say what I want to say though, the good, the bad and sometimes the ugly.  Take it for what you will but I need to disclose this to the loyal Amazon review community.Now, let me get into the headphones:THE GOOD-Lots of different size earbuds are provided both for the parts that go in your ear and for the parts that help to secure it into your ear so it doesn't fall out.  Experiment with this folks, it may take some time but you need to get this fit as good as you can as your sole enjoyment or hatred of these headphones will depend on how well you get the fit.  I cannot overemphasize this enough.-Once you get the fit, the bass will sound good and they will actually stay in your ears while you are jogging and sweating.  Unbelievable I know but I tried it myself.  I move my head a lot when I jog and I sweat a lot - and I was happy with their performance.  Just shove them in, get them situated just right and don't touch them.-Very easy to use the buttons on these to turn the volume up and down or to go forward or back with track selection-Impressive sound quality and bass-Relatively inexpensive for what they do and how they soundTWEAKS/HACKS -- Cord sticks to my neck when placed behind my head.  When I turn my head, the cord pulled on the earbuds and pulled them out/loose.  The tweak/hack for this was to just let the cord lay in front of my neck instead of behind it.  No problems with the cord in front.- When you put the headphones in and run with the cord in front of you it bumps around and into things.  This causes a "stethoscope effect" for lack of a better word with the headphones.  You hear everything and it gets magnified.  My tweak/hack for this was just to tuck the cord into my shirt neck opening.  This secured the cord thus stopping the sound transmission into my ears by all of the bumping around.If Mpow could make these headphones with no cord they would be better.  I don't know how they would do it but I am sure it is possible.  It would be great to finally go jogging with no cords - not even one between the earbuds.I did get some crackling when my iPod nano was in my pants pocket.  It was more noticeable at first but even faded away to less and less.  It wasn't a deal breaker - I also had a media pocket in my vest next to my shoulder that I put my Nano in and this really cleared up any crackling problems.  I wish they could build a playback buffer into the music stream as that would really help and allow you to place your music player really anywhere.So, that is my take on these headphones.  I didn't want to call my tweaks/hacks the bad because they are things that you would probably run into with any set of cord connected Bluetooth headphones.  I told the manufacturer I was curious to test these out and am glad that I did.  Let's face it, you just want to get the right fit, put these in, have them be comfortable, bob your head up and down for hours, profusely sweat and have these things stay in, sound great and be comfortable.  You also don't want to pay a small fortune for them either.  If you have any concerns about the fact that I received these for review purposes - read the other reviews from folks who did not receive a sample for evaluation purposes - the verdict is in and these headphones rock.

5:32 MinsI was provided a sample in exchange for my review.  My comments below represent my views and opinions of the product.This light rocks...plain and simple, just get it and you can thank me for it later.  Look at the other reviewers if you don't believe me - the reviews speak for themselves.This light rocks in so many ways but let me get started.  It is bright, like 500 lumens bright.  Most other LED lights on the market go up to 100 lumens, I see some for 140 lumens - this one is 500 lumens.  When you get up at 5AM to run on a trail there is no light, as in the moon and that is it.  The difference between a 500 lumen light and a 100 lumen light is night and day.This light also features a unique, distinctive, optical zoon feature that is just eons ahead of its competitors and unlike anything I have seen yet.  The level of zooming in and out is pretty amazing, when I am walking down the street, it is so wide you really can see everything.  This is a great feature from people out late walking their dogs to runners looking to illuminate a trail or road.  Not only will you be able to see everything but people and drivers will be able to see you.  When I run, I have to turn the light down so I don't shine it in oncoming driver's eyes.  I feel very safe both from seeing everything to everyone seeing me when I run with this light.  If you don't want this giant wide beam, just slide the top portion up and you can quickly customize this light to just the size you need.The light has different settings, low, medium, high, strobe and SOS.  The strobe is a real eye opener.  Some other feature of this light is that it comes with a wrist strap, a traveling case which is perfect for a glove box, an accessory that allows it to run off of 3 AAA batteries and of course the rechargeable Lion battery.  Since the light is so bright, and I run for 45 minutes or so, I do have to charge it up at the end of each run.  It is still on at the end of the run but its lighting output is a little diminished.  I keep 3 AAA batteries and this light stored in my glove box in case I ever need it for general use or an emergency.  I think that is a great little feature that again sets this light apart from every other LED light on the market.It is gasketed, IPX-6 rated, so it is fine for use in heavy rain.  Even the travel case has ben well thought out and executed.  Everything is foam lined and organized so nothing bumbles around making a racket in your car.  I have a few suggestions for product updates.  The first is to put a lock on the wrist strap, just like the one on the Wii.  Users can ignore this if they want but since I run I would like this added protection plus it would eliminate the strap from flinging around.  The second is to put some rubber into this product, to protect it from accidental drops and to take some weigh out of it.  As it is now, everything is metal so if you drop it, you ding it.  I am not even talking about changing it from all metal to all rubber but around the ends would be nice.One final point to note is that this light uses a high quality CREE LED that is good for 50,000 hours.  Two companies right now, CREE and Nichia, are putting out the highest quality LEDs.  CREE is US based and is really the leader in my opinion and everyone else is chasing them.  It is just a final note of quality that the manufacturer has put into this light.So the brightness, the wide optical zoom, the ability to use 3 AAA batteries and a very nice travel case is what really set this light apart from the rest of the field.

3:14 MinsI was provided a sample in exchange for my review.  My comments and opinion are my own, take them as you will.  Look at the other reviews though as these are some very nice grooming brushes for your pet.  If you have the time, I encourage you to watch my video as I demonstrate using them on my mini dachshund.This review is pretty straightforward.  I will not be using or reviewing the dematting rake because my pooch has short hair and that is not necessary.  It does look like it would get the job done though.  I will defer you to other reviewers for comments on that one.The undercoat rake did a nice job at pulling up the dead skin on my dog's back.  There was a noticeable difference between the two-sided dog brush and the undercoat rake.  I noticed a lot more dead skin coming up from the undercoat rake.My advice would be to start with the dematting rake if that applies to your pet.  Next, I would use the undercoat rake and then I would go to the metal side of the two-sided dog brush.  Finally, I would finish with the bristles on the two-sided dog brush.I really liked all of the rakes and brushes and my dog did too.  I have used these on him a couple times now and it not only calms him, cleans him, probably feels like a massage but it is some good bonding time too.  My only comment for an improvement is for a notch for my thumb on the two-sided brush and the undercoat rake, which would make these brushes a little easier to grip and control.

9:12 MinsI was provided a sample for review purposes.  All comments below are my own and represent my opinion of this product.I am very happy to be able to review this product because I could have used one of these devices a few months ago.  I did not know that these DVRs are widely being used in Europe and Asia. I lost an insurance claim when another driver did a three point turn in front of me that forced me to swerve into a ditch on the right.  This camera would have turned the tables in my favor because it would have spoken for itself.The camera is 1080P, which is what you need for resolution and to pick out license plates.  I had some video of what actually gets recorded but could not integrate it into my review because they are at different resolutions.The DVR was easy enough to operate, the suction cup is powerful, the video looks great once you move it to your computer.  Please note the DVR does not come with a transflash card, so you will need one of those before you buy this.  It continuous loops video and just records over the old video.  It also has motion detection and my favorite, just starts and stops when you turn your car on and off.Everything was easy to operate and I am very happy with my DVR.  I wish the connector was micro USB and not mini USB.  I wish it connected at the bottom and I wish there was an easier way to pop on and pop off this device not only to be able to get at the video but also to keep it out of temperature extremes in my car which will damage the device and battery.I would recommend this device to anyone in the market for one of these.  There is room for improvements but overall this is a really nice unit that will get the job done for you.

2:30 MinsI received this product as a sample for review purposes.  With that being said, all thoughts and comments below are my own opinion of the item.I did receive this for a review, yes, take it for what you will but this is an awesome cable. Look at the other reviews if you don't take my word for it.  I like several things about this cable.  I like that it is offered in multiple colors. Not only does this offer a little bit of something for everyone but it makes it super easy to distinguish among the myriad of cables that are now part of everyone's daily life.  The second thing I like about this cable is its length.  I thought a 6' cable would be too long but it turns out to be a great length.  I use this in my car to charge my phone when I have it on my windshield for navigation.  Turn out it is better to have more length than not enough.  The cable is flat, which I guess is good because it is less likely to get pinched/damaged and is also easier to thread through small openings.The only thing I did not like about this cable was that it was a little stiff and plasticy feeling...these are very minor and did not affect durability or performance in any way.Bottom line this is a solid cable that looks great, is functional, Apple certified and will stand up to lots of bending and connecting and disconnecting.
